1.title: 《Hack the tao》
1.description: 《Hack the Tao》是意大利艺术双人组Hackatao为《The Sandbox Game》设计的第一款艺术型游戏体验

2.title: 《Shinytures:Finding The Lost Creatures》
2.description: 《Shinytures:Finding The Lost Creatures》是一款冒险游戏。你作为空间组织的一员，要去完成各种令人着迷的任务。

3.title: 《Viking Fjord》
3.description: 在维京风格的环境中，成为真正的探险家。玩家将回到过去，体验峡湾的生活。

4.title: 《Dethrone》
4.description: 《Dethrone》是一款奇幻RPG冒险游戏，玩家的任务是通过完成神秘君主的任务来恢复地区的秩序。

5.title: 《Mushroom Mania》
5.description: 《Mushroom Mania》是一款以偌大的奇幻蘑菇世界为背景的收集马拉松平台游戏。

6.title: 《Tombs of Treasures》
6.description: 《Tombs of Treasures》是一款平台动作冒险步行模拟游戏。在游戏中，冒险家Liu Fogel将前往丛林寻找宝藏。

7.title: 《Sweet village》
7.description: 这位是Rex。古老的小熊软糖讲述着许许多多的传说。但没人知道Rex是如何来到这个糖果世界里的。谁知道呢，说不定他是因为吃了太多糖果才来到这儿的吧。

8.title: 《3D Print your life》
8.description: 你用过3D打印机吗？3D打印机基于CNC（计算机数控）的原理，它能帮你打印立体的物体。虽然3D打印技术已经问世多年，但近年来才被普通民众广泛使用。

discover.title: 探索《The Sandbox》
discover.description: 在《The Sandbox》的虚拟元宇宙里，玩家可以游玩、打造、拥有，并用虚拟体验获取收益。我们让艺术家、创作者和玩家能够打造自己梦寐以求的平台，为大家提供挥洒创意的方式。

nft.title: 非同质化代币
nft.description: 非同质化代币 (NFT) 是一种存储在区块链上的虚拟代币，具有数字稀缺性、安全性和真实性等特点。它们独一无二、不可分割，且无法互换，能让游戏内ASSET真正拥有数字所有权。
nft.newDescription: Discover the power of true ownership with NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens). Gear up, unlock exclusive rewards, and build immersive experiences.

land.title: 在你的LAND上创建
land.description: 非同质化代币 (NFT) 是一种存储在区块链上的虚拟代币，具有数字稀缺性、安全性和真实性等特点。它们独一无二、不可分割，且无法互换，能让游戏内ASSET真正拥有数字所有权。

sand.title: 为何使用SAND？
sand.description: $SAND是我们主要的功能型代币，你可以用它在《The Sandbox》的元宇宙中买卖LAND和ASSET。

about.title: 关于Alpha赛季2
about.description1: 只要拥有《The Sandbox》账户即可参加！！与Alpha赛季1相比，赛季2中的全部30个体验都将面向所有玩家开放（唯一针对Alpha通行证拥有者开放的体验除外）。本赛季的氛围将会全然不同，因为所有人皆可参与游戏，而且所有人都有机会通过游玩赢得Alpha通行证！
about.description2: 从2022年3月3日至3月31日，为期4周。

howToJoin.title: 参与Alpha赛季2（抽奖）

bulletPoints.description1: 在Alpha赛季2结束时，你在《The Sandbox》生态系统中游玩并投入得越多，你赢得通行证的机会就越大。赛季2的Alpha通行证将在2022年3月31日发放给抽奖获胜玩家。
bulletPoints.description2: 每周发放给每日社交媒体竞赛获胜玩家。
bulletPoints.description3: 如果有人愿意割爱，你就可以前往二级市场购买赛季2的Alpha通行证。
bulletPoints.warning: 请注意，在二级市场购买赛季2的Alpha通行证可能会遇到赝品，而且在赛季2结束后（2022年3月31日UTC时间下午4点）便没有必要继续购买通行证。

howToJoin.description2: 抽奖活动将在Alpha赛季2结束后（2022年3月31日）开启。与赛季1不同的是，在本赛季开始前不会举办抽奖活动。玩家只需体验游戏即可注册赛季2的抽奖。在游戏中完成任务（所有玩家均可免费达成）并升级即可获得抽奖券。达到等级1后（只需完成几个任务即可快速达到），你就能参加抽奖活动。
howToJoin.text3: 我最多能获得多少张抽奖券？
howToJoin.description4: 是的。在Alpha赛季2结束后，抽奖活动开始前，你钱包中的每个LAND都能为你带来40张抽奖券。获得上限为200张抽奖券（5个LAND）。你获奖的几率会大幅增加，但并不能保证一定获奖。
howToJoin.text4: 如果我是LAND所有者，我赢得Alpha通行证的几率会更大吗？
howToJoin.description5: 是的。在Alpha第2季结束后，抽奖活动开始前，你钱包中的第1季Alpha Pass将能为你带来130张额外抽奖券。数量无法累加，每个钱包中仅能有一张第1季Alpha Pass能为你带来额外抽奖券。
howToJoin.text0: 如果所有内容针对全部玩家开放，那获得Alpha通行证有什么意义呢？
howToJoin.description0: 区别在于$SAND奖励！只有Alpha通行证拥有者才能在Alpha赛季2结束后领取相应奖励。每份赛季2的Alpha通行证最多可领取高达1,000 $SAND。
howToJoin.description1: 获得第2季Alpha Pass的途径有3种：
howToJoin.description3a: 请前往「抽奖券」页面查看更多详情。
howToJoin.description3b: 如果能完全利用来源，你最多可以获得1100张抽奖券。
howToJoin.text5: 如果我获得了赛季1的Alpha通行证，我赢得赛季2的Alpha通行证的几率会更大吗？
howToJoin.text6: 如果我参加了Alpha赛季1，但并没有保留我赛季1的Alpha通行证，我赢得赛季2的Alpha通行证的几率会更大吗？
howToJoin.description6: 不会。你需要拥有赛季1的Alpha通行证才能获得对应的额外抽奖券。
howToJoin.text7: 如果我拥有多块LAND以及多张赛季1的Alpha通行证，我能赢得一张以上的赛季2的Alpha通行证吗？
howToJoin.description7: 不能。每个钱包只会计算一张赛季2的Alpha通行证。如果你已通过社交媒体竞赛获得了一张赛季2的Alpha通行证，则无法从抽奖活动中再次获得。
howToJoin.text8: 是否从某个时间点开始，我无法再获得赛季2的Alpha通行证？
howToJoin.description8a: 是的。在赛季2结束后（2022年3月31日UTC时间16点），请勿继续从二级市场购买赛季2的Alpha通行证。因为在这个时间之后购买你将无法领取$SAND奖励。
howToJoin.description8b: 不过，你可以在Alpha赛季2进行时通过OpenSea购买赛季2的Alpha通行证。只要确保你在2022年3月31日UTC时间16点之前拥有通行证即可。

playing.title: 游玩Alpha赛季2
playing.text1: 游玩Alpha赛季2有什么要求吗？
playing.description1: - 游戏需要在Windows系统上运行（其它操作系统和移动版会在未来推出）
playing.description2: - 你还需要不会断线的网络连接。
playing.description3: - 要领取你的Alpha通行证和奖励，你需要花费一点ETH来支付矿工费。

requirements.title: 《The Sandbox》Alpha版本游戏客户端最低配置需求

playing.description4: 多达40名玩家可在同一时间游玩同一个体验。当超过40位玩家想进入同一游戏体验时，该体验将会创建新的副本。也就是说，你在多人游戏中只能看到至多39位玩家，而其他的玩家会在别的副本中游玩相同体验。
playing.hrefText1: 点击此处可下载游戏客户端。
playing.text3: 我可以在Game Maker上游玩Alpha赛季2吗？
playing.description5: 内容将在赛季2的四周内逐步发布，每个工作日将发布1到4个体验。
playing.description6: 如果你点击Alpha地图上的图标，就能看见该体验发布的日期和时间。在Alpha地图的右上角，有一个日历，上面会显示新的体验发布的时间。
playing.text4: 有多少玩家可以同时游玩一个体验内容？
playing.description7: 可以，你可以前往Alpha中心，参与3个游戏体验：“NFT Institute”画廊、“Club XYZ”跳舞俱乐部，以及“Dungeon of Dum-Yz”冒险。
playing.text5: 体验内容什么时候会发布？
playing.description8: 可以。这一点非常重要，相较于赛季1，本赛季中你无需Alpha通行证即可提升进度。所有人都可以体验游戏，所有人都能获得抽奖券，并有机会在赛季2结束后赢得赛季2的Alpha通行证。
playing.text6: 我该从何了解体验内容何时发布？
playing.description9: 当你拥有赛季2的Alpha通行证后，网页界面会提示你，因为已经拥有Alpha通行证而无法在Alpha赛季2结束后的抽奖活动中再次赢得通行证，因此你不会获得任何抽奖券。但如果你出售/赠送/失去你的Alpha通行证，我们会通过后台追踪你的进度，让你无需重新完成已经做过的任务。
playing.text7: 我能和朋友一起游玩吗？
playing.description10: 不可以。在赛季2结束后你无法继续游玩。Alpha赛季2将于3月31日关闭全部体验，但唯一的限定体验除外。此体验将针对赛季2的Alpha通行证拥有者额外开放24小时（查看下方了解更多信息）。
playing.description11: 通过抽奖活动决出获得赛季2的Alpha通行证的幸运儿后，我们将开启Alpha赛级2的最后一个体验，并仅开放24小时。该体验仅对赛季2的Alpha通行证拥有者开放。是赛季2的VIP派对！
playing.description12: 其他玩家可以通过Game Maker作品集玩到你的游戏。不过，你不能将自己的游戏发布到你的LAND上。我们会在不久的将来让你能在自己的LAND上发布游戏。参与我们的Alpha Game Jams，即可获得在接下来的赛季中展示你游戏的机会。
playing.description14: All players reaching level 5 will get the season's Memorabilia (not an NFT), which will grant them extra rewards for all future seasons. We will communicate more details about that soon.
playing.description15: Just be patient. There is a possibility of high latency on blockchain between purchasing an avatar (Doggy) and that avatar showing up in Avatar Creator.
playing.text8: 如果我没有赛季2的Alpha通行证，我是否可以通过完成任务提升进度？
playing.description22: 不可以，当Alpha版本关闭后，所有体验内容在下一次通知前都不可继续游玩。
playing.text9: 如果获得Alpha通行证且完成任务后，我失去了我的Alpha通行证，那我的进度是会保留下来，还是说我必须重新完成已经做过的任务呢？
playing.description23: 可以，玩家可以通过Game Maker作品集游玩你制作的游戏。不过，你无法在自己的LAND上发布游戏。我们会在不久的将来让你能在自己的LAND上发布游戏。
playing.text10: 在2022年3月31日Alpha赛季2结束后，我是否可以继续游玩？

commands.1: /w username message Whispers a message to username.
commands.2: /m message 在元宇宙频道发送一条信息。
commands.3: /I message 在LAND频道发送一条信息。
commands.5: /users 显示已连接的玩家列表和数量。
commands.6: /instances Shows a list of the available instances running this experience.
commands.7: /join instanceld Connects to the instance defined in instanceld.
commands.8: /north Transport to land in the north.
commands.9: /south Transport to land in the south.
commands.10: /east Transport to land in the east.
commands.11: /west Transport to land in the west.
commands.12: /emote name Trigger emotes: hi, hello, agree, yes, wave, disagree, no, happy, sad, bored, dance, hophop and burnthefloor.

bulletPoints.mac: 最低配置型号：MacBookPro14,2或更新型号（或2017 Mac Mini/Desktop同等配置型号）
bulletPoints.mac1: 操作系统： MAC OS 12 (Monterey) 或更新版本
bulletPoints.mac3: CPU：3.1GHz双核Intel Core i5或更新型号

playing.description1a: 你需要在Windows或MAC OS（现已在赛季2中开放）上进行游玩。
playing.description1b: 你还需要固定的网络连接。
playing.description1c: - 要领取你的赛季2的Alpha通行证和奖励，你需要花费一些ETH来支付矿工费。
playing.description2a: 你需要下载随Alpha赛季2一起发布的最新版本的游戏客户端。点击
playing.description2c: 下载游戏客户端。所有满足配置的用户皆可免费游玩。
playing.description3a: 不可以，你需要通过游戏客户端进行游玩。游戏客户端的下载地址为
playing.description7a: 同一游戏体验最多可容纳40位玩家同时游玩。如果有超过40位玩家参与，则会为他们创建新的副本。如果你和你的朋友同时加入一个游戏体验，那很有可能会进入相同副本。但如果你们没能进入同一副本，你可以用下列方式加入他们：
playing.description7b: - 想要在进入游戏后找到你的副本ID，请输入
playing.description7e: 把你的副本ID发送给想要加入你所在副本的朋友。
playing.description7f: 若要前往你所在的副本，你的朋友必须输入
playing.text11: 先前提到过有一个体验需要赛季2的Alpha通行证才可进入，那究竟是什么体验？
playing.text12: 玩家们能游玩我制作的游戏吗？
playing.text14: I reached level 5 but did not win the Raffle, do I really get nothing?
playing.text15: I purchased a Doggy avatar and I still don't see it on the avatar selection screen.

rewards.title: Alpha赛季2奖励
rewards.text1: 抽奖券属于非同质化代币吗？
rewards.description1: 不属于。你可以将抽奖券视为玩家在Alpha赛季2中的投资，但它并非同质化代币，无法在二级市场中进行交易。
rewards.description2: 如果你赢得了奖励，你将会收到一封电子邮件，并且在抽奖活动当天，网页会有弹出窗口告诉你是否赢得了抽奖。
rewards.text2: 我该如何知道自己在抽奖中赢得了奖励？
rewards.description3: 没有。拥有赛季2的Alpha通行证是领取$SAND奖励的关键。
rewards.text3: 如果我没有赛季2的Alpha通行证，我还有别的方式可以赢得$SAND奖励吗？
rewards.description4: 不可以。每个钱包中只能拥有一张赛季2的Alpha通行证。
rewards.text4: 我能获得多张赛季2的Alpha通行证吗？
rewards.description5: 可以。你的钱包中可以拥有每个赛季的Alpha通行证各一张。
rewards.text5: 如果我已经拥有赛季1的Alpha通行证，我还能获得赛季2的Alpha通行证吗？
rewards.description6: 要想获得1,000 $SAND，你需要通过完成游戏中的Alpha任务，通关全部5个Alpha通行证关卡，边玩边赚。Alpha任务非常简单，你只需探索Alpha体验内容即可。检查奖励标签部分，了解更多关于Alpha任务和奖励的内容。
rewards.text6: 我只要游玩Alpha赛季2，就能获得1,000 $SAND吗？
rewards.description7: 不可以。你需要拥有赛季2的Alpha通行证才能有资格领取奖励。所以，如果想要领取$SAND奖励，请保留好你的通行证！
rewards.description8: 24小时。在此期间，赛季2的Alpha通行证得主可以在仅为他们开启的专属VIP体验中玩乐。
rewards.description9: 如果你拥有赛季2的Alpha通行证，你仅可以在Alpha赛季2结束后（2022年3月31日）领取$SAND奖励。
rewards.description10: 你将无法领取奖励。但如果你达到等级2后，失去通行证之后不论是找回或是获得了新的通行证，你的进度将会保存，你也会继续从等级2开始游戏。
rewards.text7: 如果我赠送/出售我赛季2的Alpha通行证，那我还能获得提升等级提供的$SAND奖励吗？
rewards.description11: 赛季2的Alpha通行证非同质化代币以及$SAND奖励都将在第1层进行领取。
rewards.text8: 从抽奖开始到领取奖励间隔多长时间？
rewards.description12: 这取决于你获得Alpha Pass的方式。
rewards.description14: 但是请记住！因为在Alpha版本结束时，你们当中仅能有一人的钱包中有通行证，所以奖励也仅有一人能领取！你可以把通行证借给朋友，让对方探索游戏，寻找乐趣，但别忘了把通行证要回来领取你的奖励！
rewards.text9: 我什么时候可以领取$SAND奖励？我可以在达到每个等级的同时领取奖励吗？
rewards.description15: Alpha通行证拥有者需要在Alpha版本的最后一天持续拥有通行证，才能领取奖励。日期（Alpha版本最后一天，即12月20日）才是关键，而通行证上的进度并不重要。即使Alpha通行证拥有者在日期前完成了所有目标，他们仍需要将通行证保留到最后一天。当Alpha版本结束时，Alpha通行证将只具备纪念价值，无法用来推进游戏进度或获取奖励。
rewards.description16: 如果你想要获得游戏进度和奖励，请不要在Alpha版本结束（12月20日）后购买Alpha通行证。但如果你仅想留作纪念，那也可以在12月20日之后进行购买。
rewards.description6a: 首先，奖励上限为1,000 $SAND，但不保证你一定能获得最高奖励。请查看下方界面，了解关于奖励社群加速器的信息。在完成赛季2的5个等级后，你可以至少获得500 $SAND的奖励。
rewards.description6b: 其次，游玩Alpha版本即可获得赢取赛季2的Alpha通行证机会。如若获奖，奖励便属于你！
rewards.text10: Alpha通行证可以交易。如果我达到2级，然后出售了我的通行证，会发生什么事情？
rewards.text11: 我将在哪个区块链上领取赛季2的Alpha通行证和$SAND奖励？
rewards.text12: 我有多少时间来领取我的赛季2的Alpha通行证？

bulletPoints.description1: 1. 如果你通过社交媒体竞赛赢得了第2季的Alpha Pass，在Alpha第2季进行中时，你必须在2022年3月31日之前领取奖励。
bulletPoints.description2: 2. 如果你在Alpha第2季结束后的抽奖活动中赢得了第2季的Alpha Pass，则没有领取时间限制。

rewards.text13: 我有多少时间来领取我的$SAND奖励？
rewards.text14: 我忘记领取Alpha赛季1的$SAND奖励了，我现在还可以领取吗？
rewards.description14b: 领取所有先前赛季中尚未领取的奖励（非同质化代币奖励、$SAND以及Alpha通行证等等）

level.title: 进度
level.text1: 我在Alpha版本中应该怎样推进进度？我该如何达到5级？
level.description1: 你需要完成Alpha任务才能在Alpha版本中推进进度。进入除Alpha中心之外的任何体验内容，找到元宇宙向导。与向导对话即可领取一个Alpha任务。你可以根据他头顶的蓝色叹号轻松找到他。
level.description2: 要想达到5级，你需要在游戏中完成足够多的Alpha任务。但请不要担心——这些任务非常简单，你只需探索游戏体验中的各个地点即可。
level.text2: 我需要每天重复做同样的事情吗？
level.description3: 游戏中并无日常活动的要求。但只要你愿意，也可以一次性完成所有目标。

presscoverage.title: 新闻媒体
presscoverage.text1: 媒体应该怎样体验Alpha赛季2？
presscoverage.description1: 与Alpha赛季1不同，媒体无需申请白名单即可探索游戏。因为所有人均可游玩并体验100%的游戏内容。
presscoverage.text2: 我该如何以新闻媒体身份请求体验Alpha版本？
presscoverage.description2: 若要申请“影响者”通行证，请通过以下邮箱与我们联系：contact@sandbox.game。请务必在邮件中告诉我们你的联系方式、观众、外展服务，以及体验Alpha版本的目的。

security.title: 安全性
security.text1: 我该如何保障自己钱包的安全？
security.description1: 有许多行为不端者正寻觅机会，获得你的代币和NFT。你需要随时保持警惕！我们建议你时刻谨记以下事项：

bulletPoints.0: 永远不与任何人分享你的助记词
bulletPoints.1: 妥善保管好你的助记词
bulletPoints.2: 为你的钱包和所有关联账号创建强密码
bulletPoints.3: 使用密码管理器时，设置强力主密码
bulletPoints.4: 在任何情况下都不在浏览器中解锁你的钱包
bulletPoints.5: 使用强密码加密你的电脑驱动，以及你的用户账号
bulletPoints.6: 不使用公共网络，若不可避免，使用VPN保护自己
bulletPoints.7: 不点击任何不明来源的邮件、Discord、聊天，和其它渠道的链接

security.description5: - Basic Safety and Security Tips for Metamask
security.description6: - To be your Own Bank with MetaMask, you need to master these best practices
security.text2: 《The Sandbox》会向我索取助记词（安全口令）吗？
security.description7: 不会，《The Sandbox》绝不会向你索取安全口令，你也不能和任何人分享你的安全口令！分享安全口令将威胁到你的钱包安全，你可能会失去所有代币和非同质化代币。
security.text3: 我应该如何反馈可疑行为？
security.description8: 如果你在社交媒体、电子邮箱或OpenSea上发现任何可疑行为，你可以通过以下方式向我们反馈：
security.description9: 通过#reporting-scams频道反馈。你也可以发送电子邮件至以下地址：contact@sandbox.game
security.text4: 我如何知道在OpenSea上购买哪些ASSET是安全的呢？
security.description10: 在OpenSea上寻找Alpha通行证、ASSET，或LAND时，请前往以下地址，确保该物品属于我们已验证的Sandbox收藏：
security.text5: “官方链接是什么？这样我就不会被骗了？
security.description7a: NO NO NO, The Sandbox will never request your secret seedphrase and you should not share your secret seedphrase with anyone, ever! Sharing your secret seedphrase will compromise your wallet and you might lose all your tokens and NFTs.
security.description7b: 骗子的手段花样百出，他们甚至会冒充《The Sandbox》的员工去获取你的个人信息！所以千万！不要！把你的助记词！告诉任何人！

roadmap.title: 路线图
roadmap.text1: 还会有其它如Alpha版本一样的赛季吗？什么时候发布？
roadmap.description1: 会的，在Alpha版本结束后，我们会推出更多赛季。下一赛季推出日期尚未确定。

staking.title: 质押与社区奖励加速器
staking.description1a: 简单来说，质押（在《The Sandbox》Alpha赛季2中）表示你「锁定」了部分加密货币，它们将随着时间为你产出收益。你可以随时终止质押并取回资金，但收益也会随之停止产出。质押额度越高、时间越长，你获得的收益也越多。
staking.description1b: 你可以通过以下链接了解更多详情：
staking.description1d: 对质押不太熟悉的用户可以阅读下方问题。以下内容十分重要，你将无需
staking.description1f: $SAND来获得Alpha赛季2中的相关奖励，你可以通过质押$SAND的方式获得奖励。此功能将为你赚得更多收益。
staking.text2: 总的来说，质押功能和赛季2有什么关联？
staking.description2b: 质押$SAND可获得额外抽奖券。
staking.description2d: 加速器将依据整个社区质押$SAND的数量，适用于赛季2的Alpha通行证中的所有$SAND奖励。
staking.text3: 详细说来，质押功能和赛季2有什么关联？
staking.description3a: 此功能有点复杂，在使用时你无需了解它的工作原理。但你也可以查看下方内容了解详情：
staking.description3c: 质押$SAND的金额越大、时间越长，「质押点数」也就越多。质押点数越多，你获得的抽奖券也就越多。
staking.description3d: 如果想通过质押功能获得最大数量的抽奖券 (200)，你需要在Alpha第2季结束时累积至少
staking.description3f: 所有人的质押点数越高，社区奖励加速器提升得就越多。社区奖励加速器提升得越多，第2季Alpha Pass提供的$SAND奖励也就越高。社区奖励加速器的上限为+100%。要想达到上限，社区质押点数需达到
staking.description3h: - 第2季Alpha Pass基础奖励为500 $SAND。如果在Alpha第2季结束时，社区质押点数达到
staking.description3i: - 如果在Alpha第2季结束时，社区质押点数达到
staking.text4: 在Alpha赛季2进行时，通过质押$SAND我还能获得相同收益吗？
staking.description4: 可以。Alpha第2季的质押功能为额外奖励性质，其收益不受任何影响。你的SAND也不会长时间锁定。质押功能本身不会有任何改变。Alpha第2季中的「上限」也完全不会对产出收益有任何影响。
staking.text5: 社区奖励加速器在哪个区块链上运行？
staking.description5: 在第2层，但仅在SAND质押程序上（不在SAND/MATIC程序上）运行。此功能的关键在于鼓励大家将SAND质押在第2层，以便我们迁移至第2层。这样一来，游戏将会得到大幅优化，而矿工费也会相应降低，让《The Sandbox》更加绿色环保！
staking.text6: 质押点数是如何计算的？
staking.description6a: 同样的，你无需了解计算方式也可以很好地使用此功能。但如果你好奇它的运作方式，请查看以下内容：
staking.description6b: 在28天中，每质押1 SAND即可获得
staking.description6c: 此数量会上下浮动，你会根据质押数量获得相应的质押点数。
staking.description6e: 时间和质押的SAND都是计算质押点数的关键。
staking.description6j: 社区的总质押点数为每位用户的质押点数之和。
staking.description6k: 请注意，SAND的质押天数无需连贯。
staking.text7: 我需要等Alpha第2季开始后才质押SAND吗？
staking.description7a: 无需等待，你现在即可开始质押。
staking.description7b: 你会在Alpha赛季2开始后获得相应的质押点数。我们会简单地查看你在开始计算点数之前质押了多少数量。
staking.description7c: 你无需等到Alpha赛季2开始后再进行质押，你也无需在Alpha赛季2开始后提取并再次质押你的资金，从而最大化你的质押点数。
staking.description7d: 你和社区在Alpha第2季开始后才会获得质押点数。质押点数的个人目标
staking.text8: 你们只谈到$SAND质押，那《The Sandbox》的SAND/MATIC质押程序呢？
staking.description8: Alpha赛季2的功能仅和SAND质押池关联。在SAND/MATIC程序上质押不会获得任何与Alpha赛季2相关奖励。此程序运作方式相同，也会产生相同收益。我们并未遗弃它，只不过它与Alpha赛季2无关。
staking.description9: 不会。此数字不会减少。你获得的点数都会算在社群加速器总点数中。如果你提取了质押，质押点数也将不再产生，但不会失去已经获得的点数。
staking.text10: Alpha版本已经开始几个星期了，我现在还能质押吗？会不会太迟？
staking.description10: 不会。但如果你想通过质押获得最大数量的抽奖券（200张），那你质押的时间越晚，需要质押的数量也就越多。即使你没有质押到一定数量，而Alpha赛季2又结束在即，你还是可以通过质押获得一些抽奖券。请不要因为时间不足或资源不够获得200张抽奖券就觉得获得部分抽奖券没有意义。因为不论与Alpha赛季2的奖励是否相关，质押本身就是收益颇丰的功能
staking.description3h1: 分以上，社区奖励加速器将提升至+100%。而第2季的Alpha Pass奖励也将提升至+100%，即所有第2季的Alpha Pass拥有者将获得1,000 $SAND。
staking.description3i1: 分以上，社区奖励加速器将提升至+57%。而第2季Alpha Pass奖励也将提升至+57%，即所有第2季Alpha Pass拥有者将获得785 $SAND (500 + 0.57x500)。
staking.description6g1: 质押点数（可获得200抽奖券）。在整个Alpha赛季中（28天），每质押1 SAND即可获得
staking.description6g4: 质押点数（14天内，质押1 SAND）
staking.description6g5: 质押点数（28天内，质押2 SAND）
staking.description6g6: 质押点数（7天内，质押4 SAND）
staking.description6i2: 总计质押点数（社区奖励加速器提升至+100%）。
staking.description7d2: 需要在Alpha第2季进行时达成。

progression.title: Progression
progression.text1: How do I progress in the Alpha? How can I reach level 5?
progression.description1a: You need to complete Alpha Quests to progress in the Alpha. Enter any experience other than the Alpha Hub and locate the Metaverse Guide. Talk to him to get an Alpha Quest. You can easily spot him thanks to the blue exclamation mark above his head.
progression.description1b: Most quests are indicated by a yellow exclamation mark above the head of the NPC that will trigger the quest.
progression.description1c: Some quests are part of Quests Chains and will automatically be triggered when you complete other quests.
progression.description1d: Look for yellow exclamation marks and talk to NPCs (even if they don’t have Quests to give you they might steer you in the direction of an NPC who does!).
progression.text2: Do I need to perform a daily action repeatedly?
progression.description2: No. New experiences (hence new quests) are released every weekday, so eager players will play every day but if you want you can come late and do a lot of quests at once! Be careful though, there are a lot of quests and a lot of content! Some people will accumulate a lot of Raffle Tickets by completing a lot of quests. If you want to have good chances to win the Season 2 Alpha Pass by the end of the Alpha Season 2, you better not start working on quests too late or you won’t have time to complete much.

about.title: About the Alpha Season 3
about.titleKey: Who can access the Alpha Season 3?
about.descriptionKey: Everyone with a TSB account! Just like Alpha Season 2, all of the Season 3 experiences will be open to all. Everybody can play, and everybody has a chance to win an Alpha Pass and SAND by playing!
about.titleKey1: How long does the Alpha last?

raffle.title: Joining the Alpha Season 3 (Raffle)
raffle.titleKey: What is the point of the Alpha Pass if everything is open to everyone?
raffle.descriptionKey:
The SAND rewards! Only Alpha Pass owners can claim the AS3 Alpha Rewards at the end of the Alpha Season 3. Rewards can be as much as 500 SAND per S3 Alpha Pass.

BUT, there are also rewards not linked to the Alpha Pass for LAND owners, Avatar owners, and NFT collectors – more information below!
raffle.titleKey1: How can I get an Alpha Pass?
raffle.descriptionKey1:
There are 3 ways of winning a S3 Alpha Pass:

 -  The Raffle: The more you play and the more you invest yourself in The Sandbox ecosystem through the end of Alpha Season 3, the more chances you have to win an Alpha Pass.
 -  Weekly Alpha Giveaway: Participate in Twitter contests once a week to get a chance to win an Alpha Pass.
 -  OpenSea: You can buy a S3AP on the secondary market if someone is willing to sell theirs. {0}
raffle.descriptionKey1-1: Be careful when purchasing a S3AP on the secondary market as there may be fakes and there is no point in purchasing one after Alpha Season 3 has ended!
raffle.titleKey2: How do I register for the Raffle?
raffle.descriptionKey2: The Raffle will occur at the end of the Alpha Season 3. To register for the Season 3 Raffle, you simply have to play experiences. By completing quests in the game (which everybody can do for free) you will earn EPs (Ethos Points) and Raffle Tickets by leveling up. As soon as you reach level 1 (which is very fast; you only need to complete a few quests) and your account has been validated by the identity verification, you will become eligible for the Raffle.
raffle.titleKey3: What is the maximum number of Raffle tickets that I can get?
raffle.descriptionKey3:
In total, you can earn up to 2,500 Raffle Tickets if you max out every source.

Here is the complete detail:
- Ethos Points (by completing quests): up to 500 Raffle Tickets (after earning 300 EPs)
- Staking: up to 500 Raffle Tickets
- Season 1 Alpha Pass Owner: 210 Raffle Tickets
- Season 2 Alpha Pass Owner: 210 Raffle Tickets
- Season 1 Memorabilia: 150 Raffle Tickets
- Season 2 Memorabilia: 150 Raffle Tickets
- Belonging Week Memorabilia: 150 Raffle Tickets
- Completing S2 feedback form: 30 Raffle Tickets
- Daily events: up to 350 Raffle Tickets
- Friend referral: up to 250 Raffle Tickets
raffle.titleKey4: Do I have more chances to win an Alpha Pass if I’m a LAND owner?
raffle.descriptionKey4: No. But there is a guaranteed (not linked to any random chance) reward for being a LAND owner if you play in Season 3. More information below.
raffle.titleKey5: Do I have more chances to win a Season 3 Alpha Pass if I own a Season 1 Alpha Pass or a Season 2 Alpha Pass?
raffle.descriptionKey5: Yes. You get 210 extra Raffle Tickets for each Alpha Pass from past Seasons in your wallet by the end of the Alpha Season 3 when the Raffle starts. You cannot cumulate Alpha Pass of the same season for Raffle Tickets but you can have up to 420 Raffle Tickets if you own a Season 1 Alpha Pass and a Season 2 Alpha Pass.
raffle.titleKey6: Can I win more than 1 Season 3 Alpha Pass?
raffle.descriptionKey6: No. One Season 3 Alpha Pass per wallet only. For example, if you get a Season 3 Alpha Pass by participating in Social Contests, you will not be able to get another one from the Raffle.
raffle.titleKey7: Is there a moment where there is no point anymore to get a Season 3 Alpha Pass?
raffle.descriptionKey7: Yes. Do not purchase a S3AP on the secondary market after Season 3 has ended as you will no longer be able to claim the SAND rewards with it if you purchase it after this date. But, you can safely purchase a S3AP on OpenSea while Alpha Season 3 is ongoing.

earning.title: Earning in the Alpha Season 3
earning.titleKey: Are there other ways than the Alpha Pass to earn rewards for Alpha Season 3?
earning.descriptionKey: Yes, for this season, we added two new sources of earning: the Owner Guaranteed Rewards and the Leaderboard. More information below.
earning.titleKey1: How can I be eligible for the Guaranteed Rewards?
earning.descriptionKey1:
There are 3 different types of Guaranteed Rewards for 3 different ownerships:
 - LAND Owners
 - NFT Avatar Owners
 - NFT Collector Badge
 If you own one or more of these at the end of the season, you will receive a reward based on the level you reached during the Alpha.
earning.titleKey2: Do any Avatars or NFTs count?
earning.descriptionKey2: Only NFTs released as part of Season 3 Collections will unlock the Avatar Owner and NFT Collector Badge reward. You can see which NFTs are included in the “NFT Shop” tab in the Alpha section of the website.
earning.titleKey3: How can I earn the NFT Collector Badge?
earning.descriptionKey3:
You need to collect 1 NFT from the Season 3 Collections to unlock the badge and earn the guaranteed owner reward.
Any NFT from the Season 3 Collections will work but other NFTs are not eligible for the badge. You can see which NFTs are included in the “NFT Shop” tab in the Alpha section of the website.
earning.descriptionKey4: The Leaderboard is a new feature in the Alpha Season 3 where you can compete with other players to win rewards based on your rank.
earning.titleKey5: How can I win on the Leaderboard?
earning.descriptionKey5: The Leaderboard is scored on EPs (Ethos Points) first, with a completion time tiebreaker. EPs are earned by completing Quests. Repeat Quests to improve your completion time, which will improve your ranking on the Leaderboard against players with the same number of EPs as you.
earning.titleKey6: I went up in the Leaderboard while not doing anything, why?
earning.descriptionKey6:
You might see yourself go up in the leaderboard if some users who are ranking above you fall into the following categories and are removed from the Leaderboard:
 - A cheater who got caught and banned
 - A user who did not complete KYC (Know Your Customer) before the end of the season (more information about KYC below)

playing.title: Playing the Alpha Season 3
playing.titleKey: What do I need to play the Alpha Season 3?
playing.descriptionKey:
- You need to play on Windows or Mac OS

 - Minimum configuration PC:
 OS: Windows 10 64bit
 GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or newer
 CPU: i5-8400 or newer (AVX support is required)
 RAM: 8192MB or more

 - Minimum configuration Mac:
 OS: MAC OS 10.13 or newer
 GPU: HD4000 equivalent or newer
 CPU: 3.1GHz dual-core Intel Core i5 or newer
 RAM: 8192MB or more

 - You also need a stable internet connection. 
 - You will also need a bit of ETH to pay for the gas fees if you want to claim an Alpha Pass.
playing.titleKey1: How do I play the Alpha Season 3?
playing.descriptionKey1: You will need to download the latest version of the Game Client that will be released alongside the Alpha Season 3. Click {0} to download the Game Client. Everybody with the right configuration can play and it’s free.
playing.titleKey2: Can I play the Alpha Season 3 on the Game Maker?
playing.descriptionKey2: No, you will need to play on the Game Client. You will be able to download the Game Client at {0} when the Alpha Season 3 opens.
playing.titleKey3: How many people can get in one Experience at the same time?
playing.descriptionKey3: Up to 40 players can play in one experience at the same time. When more than 40 players try to enter the same experience, a new instance of that experience is created. This means that when you are in a multiplayer experience you will only see up to 39 other players, but there could be many more players in other instances of the same experience.
playing.descriptionKey4: Content will be released progressively with 1 to 2 experiences released every day during the 10 weeks of Season 3.
playing.titleKey5: How do I know when an Experience will be revealed?
playing.descriptionKey5: If you click on the Experience icon on the Alpha Map, you’ll see the date and time when it will be revealed. In the top right corner of the Alpha Map, you will also find a calendar showing when new Experiences will be released in the future.
playing.titleKey6: Can I play along with a friend?
playing.descriptionKey6:
An Experience can have up to 40 players at a time; if there are more than 40 players, new instances are created to host the additional players. If you join an Experience at the same time as your friend, you have a high chance to end up in the same instance. But if you don’t, you can join them by following these steps:

 To find your instance ID after you enter the game, type {0} in chat.
 Give your instance ID to your friend who wants to join your instance.
 To jump to your instance, your friend must type {1} in the chat. For example, {2} to join instance 2234.

 Type {3} in the in-game chat to see all chat commands
playing.titleKey7: Can I Earn progression by completing quests without a Season 3 Alpha Pass?
playing.descriptionKey7: Yes. This is a very important thing to understand – you don’t need the Alpha Pass to progress. Everybody can play and everybody can earn Raffle Tickets to win a Season 3 Alpha Pass during the Raffle at the end of Season 3.
playing.titleKey8: If I get an Alpha Pass, do quests, then lose my Alpha Pass, will my progression be retroactively tracked or do I need to redo all the quests I did?
playing.descriptionKey8: When you have your Season 3 Alpha Pass, the website interface will tell you that you are no longer eligible to win one during the Raffle at the end of Alpha Season 3. Thus, while you have a pass you will not show as having any Raffle Tickets. However, if you sell, give away, or lose your Alpha Pass, you won’t have to redo any of the quests you’ve already completed as we track your progression in the background and it will show up when the Alpha Pass is removed from your account.
playing.titleKey9: Can I keep playing Alpha Season 3 after it ends?
playing.descriptionKey9: No, you cannot keep playing after the closing date.
playing.titleKey10: Can players play the games I made?
playing.descriptionKey10: Players can play your games inside the Game Maker Gallery. However, you can’t publish your games on your LAND yet. We are working to enable publishing on your LAND in the near future. Get a chance to put your games in one of our upcoming seasons by participating in our Alpha Game Jams.
playing.descriptionKey11:
Chat commands are as follow:

 {0} – Whispers to the username a message.
 {1} – Send a message to the metaverse channel.
 {2} – Send a message to the land channel.
 {3} – Teleport to the spawn point.
 {4} – Show connected players list and count.
 {5} – Show a list of the available instances running this experience.
 {6} – Connects to the instance defined in instanceID.
 {7} – Transport to land on the north.
 {8} – Transport to land on the south.
 {9} – Transport to land on the east.
 {10} – Transport to land on the west.
 {11} – Trigger emotes: hi, hello, agree, yes, wave, disagree, no, happy, sad, bored, dance, hophop, and burnthefloor.
 {12} – Stop current emote.

rewards.title: Alpha Season 3 Rewards
rewards.descriptionKey: No. You can view Raffle Tickets as an indicator of a player’s investment in the Alpha Season 3, but they are not NFTs and cannot be traded on the secondary market.
rewards.titleKey1: How will I know if I won the Raffle?
rewards.descriptionKey1: You will receive an email if you won, and you will get a popup on the website informing you if you won or didn’t win the Raffle on the Raffle day.
rewards.titleKey2: Is there a way to earn the SAND rewards from the Raffle if I don’t have the Season 3 Alpha Pass?
rewards.descriptionKey2: No. The Season 3 Alpha Pass is the key that allows you to claim the SAND rewards.
rewards.titleKey3: Can I get a Season 3 Alpha Pass if I already have a Season 1 Alpha Pass or a Season 2 Alpha Pass?
rewards.descriptionKey3: Yes. You can own one Alpha Pass of each Season in your wallet.
rewards.titleKey4: Do I get the 500 SAND reward just for playing the Alpha Season 3?
rewards.descriptionKey4:
First, the rewards might go up to 500 SAND but it’s not guaranteed; please see the section below about the Reward Community Booster. Rewards will be AT LEAST 250 SAND for completing the 5 levels of Season 3.
 Second, playing the Alpha gives you a chance to win a Season 3 Alpha Pass through the Raffle.
 If you win, the rewards are yours!
rewards.titleKey5: If I gift/sell/lose my Season 3 Alpha Pass, can I still get the SAND rewards for the levels I completed?
rewards.descriptionKey5: No. You need the Season 3 Alpha Pass to trigger the Raffle rewards claim, so hold on to it if you want your SAND rewards!
rewards.titleKey6: How long between the Raffle and the Reward Claim?
rewards.titleKey7: When can I claim the SAND rewards? Can I claim them as I progress through each level?
rewards.descriptionKey7: You can claim the SAND rewards only at the end of the Alpha Season 3 if you own a Season 3 Alpha Pass.
rewards.titleKey8: Alpha passes can be traded. What happens if I make it to Level 2 and then trade my pass?
rewards.descriptionKey8: You won’t be able to claim rewards. However, if you reach level 2 and lose your Pass but then either get it back or another Pass back, you will be back to level 2 with your progression saved.
rewards.titleKey9: On which chain will the Season 3 Alpha Pass and SAND rewards be claimed?
rewards.descriptionKey9: Claiming of the Season 3 Alpha Pass NFT is on Ethereum Mainnet while the SAND is claimed on Polygon Mainnet. Don’t worry if you never used Polygon (layer 2) on your wallet; all the steps necessary to use this layer will be explained when you will claim your rewards.
rewards.titleKey10: How much time do I have to claim my Season 3 Alpha Pass?
rewards.descriptionKey10:
It depends on how you got your Alpha Pass.
 1. If you won your S3AP through a Social Contest, while Alpha Season 3 was ongoing, you must claim it BEFORE THE END of Alpha Season 3 or it will be lost!
 2. If you won your S3AP through the Raffle at the end of Alpha Season 3, there is no deadline to claim it.
rewards.titleKey11: How much time do I have to claim my SAND rewards?
rewards.descriptionKey11: There is no time limit to claim your SAND rewards.
rewards.titleKey12: Do I need to go through Know Your Customer (KYC) to claim rewards?
rewards.descriptionKey12: Yes! Know Your Customer is a standard requirement in the financial industry, and is used to verify customers and mitigate money laundering risks. We also use it to make sure users only play on one account. We are aware that it’s not always reassuring to share personal information but this is the only way to make sure the game is fair for everyone when it comes to rewards that translate to real money. Be absolutely sure that your data will NEVER be used for any other purpose than validating your account. The data is not even available to The Sandbox and its partners; it’s encrypted on our KYC provider database where even they cannot access or exploit the information.
rewards.titleKey13: I forgot to claim my SAND rewards from Alpha Season 1 or Alpha Season 2, can I still do that?
rewards.descriptionKey13: You can claim all unclaimed rewards related to previous Seasons (NFT rewards, SAND, Alpha Passes…) on this {0}

staking.title: Staking and Community Reward Booster
staking.descriptionKey:
To make things simple, staking (in the context of TSB Alpha Season 3) means that you “lock” some of your cryptocurrency to a pool, which will in return earn a yield for you over time. You can stop your staking and recover your funds at any time, but you will stop earning the yield. The more you stake for a longer time, the bigger the yield you will get.

 You’ll find a lot more details here:
 {0}

 For people who are not familiar with staking, and will read the questions below, it’s very important to understand that you do not {1} SAND to earn bonuses related to Alpha Season 3. Instead, you get bonuses from staking SAND, which can already be a very profitable feature in itself.
staking.titleKey1: In summary, how does the Staking feature relates to Season 3?
staking.descriptionKey1:
1. {0} staking SAND will grant you extra Raffle Tickets.
 2. {1} a booster will be applied to all S3AP SAND rewards based on the total amount of SAND staked by the whole community.
staking.titleKey2: In detail, how does the Staking feature relates to Season 3?
staking.descriptionKey2:
This feature is a bit complex, but you don’t have to understand how it works under the hood to make optimal use of it, However you can find the details below:

 1. {0} The more and the longer you stake SAND, the more your “staking score” increases. The bigger your staking score, the more Raffle Tickets you will get.
 To get the maximum number of Raffle Tickets from the staking feature (500) you need to have accumulated at least 500 staking score points by the end of the Alpha Season 3.

 2. {1} The bigger everyone’s staking score is, the more the Community Reward Booster increases. The more the Community Reward Booster increases, the more the Season 3 Alpha Pass SAND reward is increased for all.
 The Community Reward Booster is capped at a maximum of +100%. To reach this cap, the community staking score has to reach the target of 40,000,000 points.

 Examples: 
 - The S3AP base reward is 250 SAND. If by the end of Alpha Season 3, the community staking score reached 40,000,000 points or more, the Community Reward Booster will reach +100%. Therefore, the S3AP reward will be increased by +100% and reach 500 SAND for all S3AP owners.
 - If by the end of Alpha Season 3, the community staking score reached 24,800,000 points, the Community Reward Booster will reach +62%. Therefore, the S3AP reward will be increased by +62% and reach 405 SAND (250 + 62% of 250) for all S3AP owners.
staking.titleKey3: Will I still get the same yield for staking SAND during Alpha Season 3?
staking.descriptionKey3: Yes, the staking features related to Alpha Season 3 act as a bonus and will not impact the yield in any way. Your SAND will not be locked for longer. Nothing changes with the staking feature itself. The “caps” related to Alpha Season 3 features have no impact on the yield at all.
staking.titleKey4: On which chain does the Community Reward Booster work?
staking.descriptionKey4: The Community Reward Booster is on Layer 2 (Polygon), but only on the SAND staking program (not on the SAND/MATIC program). The whole point of the feature is to incentivize SAND staking on layer 2 to continue our transition to layer 2, which will be a great improvement to the game by reducing gas fees and making The Sandbox a lot greener!
staking.titleKey5: How is the staking score calculated?
staking.descriptionKey5:
Again, you do not need to understand the math to make optimal use of this feature, but if you are curious, this is how it works:
 {0}
 This number is a float; you will get exactly the amount of staking score points related to your staking contribution.

 {1}

 It is important to understand that both time and SAND staked amount are taken into account to calculate the staking score.

 1. {2} The cap is 500 staking score points (to get 500 Raffle Tickets). For every 1 SAND staked for the whole duration of the Alpha (70 days) you get 1 staking score point.
 It means that if you stake 500 SAND for 70 days you will earn the max amount of Raffle Tickets. You can also stake 1,000 SAND for 35 days, or 7,000 SAND for 10 days, for example.

 2. {3} The cap is 40,000,000 collective cumulated staking score points (to get the Community Reward Booster to +100%).
 The total amount of staking score points for the community is just the sum of each user's staking score.

 Please note that the amount of days that SAND is staked does not have to be consecutive.
staking.descriptionKey5-1: You get 1 staking score points for every 1 SAND staked during 70 days.
staking.titleKey6: Should I wait for Alpha Season 3 to begin to start staking SAND?
staking.descriptionKey6:
You can start staking right now, you don’t have to wait.
 If you want to stake now, you definitely should. Might as well get your yield growing as soon as possible!

 You will start to earn staking score points related to Alpha Season 3 features once the Alpha Season 3 starts, but we will simply look at how much you have previously staked at that moment and start calculating your score.
 You do not need to wait for Alpha Season 3 to begin to start staking, and you do not need to withdraw and stake back your funds once Alpha Season 3 has started to optimize your staking score.
 You, and the community, will not start earning staking score points until the Alpha Season 3 has started. The staking score points objectives, both individual (500) and collective (40,000,000), have to be met in between the start and the end of the Alpha Season 3.
staking.titleKey7: You are only talking about SAND staking, what about the TSB SAND/MATIC staking program?
staking.descriptionKey7: Alpha Season 3 features are only linked to the SAND staking pool. Staking on the SAND/MATIC program does not offer any bonus related to Alpha Season 3. This program will still work the same and produce the same yield. It’s still supported, it’s just not related to Alpha Season 3.
staking.titleKey8: Can I lose staking score points?
staking.descriptionKey8: No, this number cannot go down. Points earned are earned for you and added to the Community Booster cumulative score. If you withdraw your stake, you will stop earning staking points, but you won’t lose what you have earned.
staking.titleKey9: The Alpha already started multiple weeks ago; is there still a point for me to start staking now, am I too late?
staking.descriptionKey9: You are never too late. The later you stake, the more SAND you will have to stake if you want to max out the number of Raffle Tickets that can be earned through staking (500). Even if you don’t stake that much and Alpha Season 3 will end soon, you can still get some Raffle Tickets for staking, even if it’s not the full 500 possible tickets. Also, staking can be a very profitable feature in itself, aside from its Alpha Season 3 bonuses.

progression.title: Progression
progression.titleKey: How do I progress in the Alpha Season 3? How can I reach level 5?
progression.descriptionKey:
You need to enter Experiences in The Sandbox and complete quests to earn EPs and progress in the Alpha Season 3.
 Most quests are indicated by a yellow exclamation mark above the head of the NPC that will trigger the quest.
 Some quests are part of Quest Chains and will automatically be triggered when you complete other quests.
 Look for yellow exclamation marks and talk to NPCs (even if they don’t have Quests to give you they might steer you in the direction of an NPC who does!).
progression.titleKey1: Do I need to perform a daily action repeatedly?
progression.descriptionKey1: No. New experiences (hence new quests) are released everyday, so eager players will play every day but if you want you can come late and do a lot of quests at once! Be careful though, there are a lot of quests and a lot of content! Some people will accumulate a lot of Raffle Tickets by completing a lot of quests. If you want to have good chances to win the Season 3 Alpha Pass by the end of the Alpha Season 3, it’s better to not start working on quests too late or you won’t have time to complete much.

security.title: Security
security.titleKey: How can I keep my wallet safe?
security.descriptionKey:
There are a lot of bad actors waiting for an opportunity to get your tokens and NFTs. You need to be really careful! We suggest that you always keep in mind the following recommendations:

 - Never share your seed phrase with anyone
 - Don’t keep your seed phrase unprotected
 - Create strong passwords for your wallet and any accounts associated with it
 - Use a password manager with a very strong master password
 - Do not, under any circumstances, leave your wallet unlocked in the browser
 - Encrypt your PC drive and use strong passwords for it and your user account
 - Avoid using public Wi-Fi, and if it cannot be helped, use VPN to protect yourself
 - Do not click links from any unknown email, Discord, chat, or any other source
 - Stay alert!

 Read more about these suggestions here: {0}

 Additional security resources:

 - {1}
 - {2}
security.descriptionKey0-1: Basic Safety and Security Tips for Metamask
security.descriptionKey0-2: To Be Your Own Bank with MetaMask, You Need to Master These Password Best Practices
security.titleKey1: Will The Sandbox ever request my secret seedphrase (aka passphrase)?
security.descriptionKey1:
NO, NO, and NO. The Sandbox will never request your secret seedphrase and you should not share your secret seedphrase with anyone, ever! Sharing your secret seedphrase will compromise your wallet and you might lose all your tokens and NFTs.

 Scammers are VERY creative and will go as far as steal TSB employee’s identities to try to get you to give away information! NEVER. GIVE. AWAY. YOUR. SEED. PHRASE. TO. ANYONE.
security.titleKey2: How can I report suspicious activity?
security.descriptionKey2: If you detect any suspicious activity on social media, email, or OpenSea, you can report it on our Discord channel ({0}) via the #reporting-scams channel. You can also reach us out by email at contact@sandbox.game.
security.titleKey3: How do I know which assets are safe to buy on OpenSea?
security.descriptionKey3: When looking for Alpha Passes, Assets, or LANDs on OpenSea, make sure it belongs to our verified Sandbox collection at {0}.
security.titleKey4: What are the official links so I make sure I don’t get scammed?

14.title: Leaderboard anti-cheating measures
14.description: A security is in place to prevent cheating on the leaderboard:
bulletPoints: The Sandbox measured the fastest completion time for each quest.
We reduced that measurement because our players are more skilled than us! It gives us what is considered a “do-able” time.
If a player completes a quest faster than the “do-able” time we will consider the time invalid as it should mean that they are using cheats or completing quests in a non intended way.
On the leaderboard only EPs from quests completed in valid times are accounted for.
On the Reward tab all EPs count no matter if the time is valid or not.

Please let us know if you found any bug. Feel free to write us at:

models.title: 创造你自己的体素模型

cards.1: 如果要上传你的模型，请先通过我们的“创作者基金”注册成为艺术家。
cards.2: VoxEdit是唯一能将ASSET导出至我们市场的软件。下载VoxEdit并开始创造。
cards.3: 当完成模型后，按照以下简单步骤即可将其导出至市场。

1.title: 模型制作工具
1.description: 尽情发挥你的创意！不论是初学者还是专家，人人都能通过我们强大的工具组和简洁易用的界面打造精美作品。

2.title: 动画制作工具
2.description: 改变由体素打造的世界。利用VoxEdit的骨骼系统，你可以使用时间轴，通过简单易用的关键帧模式装配并动态化你的任何作品。

3.title: NFT制作工具
3.description: 在《The Sandbox》市场出售、交易和购买VoxEditASSET，用创作来赚取收益。95%的收益都会归你，也就是创作者所有！

artists.title: 我们艺术家的创作内容

0.text: VoxEdit给我留下了深刻印象，这是一款将建模编辑工具与动画系统相结合的软件。
0.author: William Santacruz

1.text: 对于需要动态化作品的体素艺术家而言，VoxEdit这款市面上唯一的体素专用编辑工具提供了骨骼装配和时间轴动画等功能，是游戏规则的改变者。
1.author: Alex Florez

2.text: “這是最簡單的象素動畫創作工具之一，它為初學者提供了一個好看又易用的介面。”
2.author: Nicolas Morrone

play.title: 遵守游戏规则！
play.text1: 默认尺寸为32*32*32，在《The Sandbox》的宇宙中会转换为米（3,2 f）
play.text2: 32x32x32是在一立方米内可容纳的最大尺寸。一个人物造型的大约为2个方块高（64体素）。
play.text3: VoxEdit提供了大量模板，可协助你开启创造的大门。不过在开始创造之前，请先查看我们的技术指南，以确保你的ASSET能在游戏制作工具中以最佳方式呈现。

funding.title: 两百万创作者基金介绍
funding.subtitle: 我们想协助你在我们的平台上创作、分享，并出售你精美的体素作品

cards.1: 首先，你需要完成注册我们才能评估你的作品，因为我们想鼓励那些品质最佳的体素ASSET
cards.2: 你的每件ASSET都能为你带来收益，而且出售利润为100%！
cards.3: 此基金的总目标是为游戏创造出10,000件体素ASSET
cards.4: 除了补贴之外，你还可以在《The Sandbox》发行后将自己的作品出售给其他玩家

funding.text: 此项目仅限符合条件的前1,000位艺术家参与，所以赶紧注册，抓住享受福利的机会！

header.title: 《The Sandbox》人物造型
header.description: 自定义你的外观，用装备提升它的属性，和好友一起在《The Sandbox》的元宇宙中畅玩。

1.title: 打造你的风格
1.description: 快速搭配不同的服装、发型和颜色，打造独一无二的外观。

2.title: 拓展社交
2.description: 在《The Sandbox》的虚拟世界中结交好友，与成千上万玩家一起交流。

3.title: 装备上你的人物造型，开始游戏
3.description: 用装备提升自己的属性，准备开始游戏。

section1.description1: 你的个人档案图片将提升一个等级。现在，你可以选择你最喜爱的虚拟化身来探索《The Sandbox》元宇宙。
section1.description2: 关联你的钱包可查找你是否拥有外部虚拟化身。

section2.title: 选择人物造型
section2.subtitle: 寻找自己的风格，在人群中脱颖而出
section2.description: 也可选用预先设计好的人物造型轻松开始游戏。我们的最佳艺术家们设计了20款模型可供选择，让你能立刻加入《The Sandbox》元宇宙！

1.title: Create your style
1.description: Quickly combine different outfits, hairstyles and colors to get a unique look.

2.title: Get Social
2.description: Meet with friends and socialize with thousands of players in The Sandbox virtual world.

3.title: Equip your avatar and Play
3.description: Boost your attributes with equipment and get ready to play.

section3.title: 自定义人物造型
section3.description: 快速搭配不同的服装、发型和颜色，创造独一无二的造型
section3.description1: 寻找自己的风格，在人群中脱颖而出。
section3.description2: 用预先设计好的虚拟化身轻松开始游戏。我们的最佳艺术家们设计了20款模型可供选择，让你能立刻加入《The Sandbox》元宇宙！

section4.title: 在虚拟世界中交际
section4.description1: 结识造型各异的万千用户。在《The Sandbox》的虚拟LAND中和他们一起探索、发现，和游玩。
section4.description2: 发现真实的自我：无限可能等你来发掘。

section5.title: 用装备提升你的虚拟化身属性
section5.subtitle: 装备上你的虚拟化身，获得特殊技能

part1.title: 装备上你的人物造型，获得特殊技能。
part1.gameMakerLinkText: 所有人物造型的能力都由一组特定属性决定：
part1.text2: 力量、幸运、防御、速度，以及魔法。
part1.text3: 想要更强大的人物造型吗？前往
part1.text4: 从社区创造的成千上万选择中，挑选适合你的武器。它们很快就会和大家见面。
part1.description1: Equipment are Tokens that can be traded. They have Catalysts and Gems just as other assets do. Yes, you can also create and mint Equipment through VoxEdit!

part2.title: 使用VoxEdit创造自定义装备
part2.description: 装备是可以交易的代币。它们与其它ASSET一样，拥有CATALYST和GEM。是的，你也可以通过VoxEdit创造和铸造装备！
part2.description1: Quickly combine different outfits, hairstyles and colors to create a unique style.

section5.text1: 在《The Sandbox》Game Maker中，所有虚拟化身的能力都由一组特定属性决定：力量、防御、速度和魔法。
section5.text2: 想要一个更强的虚拟化身？那就前往市场，从社区创造的成千上万个选择中挑选最合适的武器。它们很快就会和大家见面。

play.title: 遵守游戏规则！
play.text1: 默认尺寸为32*32*32，在《The Sandbox》的宇宙中会转换为米（3,2 f）
play.text2: 32x32x32是在一立方米内可容纳的最大尺寸。一个人物造型的大约为2个方块高（64体素）。
play.text3: VoxEdit提供了大量模板，可协助你开启创造的大门。不过在开始创造之前，请先查看我们的技术指南，以确保你的ASSET能在游戏制作工具中以最佳方式呈现。

funding.title: 两百万创作者基金介绍
funding.subtitle: 我们想协助你在我们的平台上创作、分享，并出售你精美的体素作品

how.title: 以下为运作方式
cards: 首先，你需要完成注册我们才能评估你的作品，因为我们想鼓励那些品质最佳的体素ASSET
你的每件ASSET都能为你带来收益，而且出售利润为100%！
此基金的总目标是为游戏创造出10,000件体素ASSET
除了补贴之外，你还可以在《The Sandbox》发行后将自己的作品出售给其他玩家

part1.title: 装备上你的人物造型，获得特殊技能。
part1.gameMakerLinkText: 所有人物造型的能力都由一组特定属性决定：
part1.text2: 力量、幸运、防御、速度，以及魔法。
part1.text3: 想要更强大的人物造型吗？前往
part1.text4: 从社区创造的成千上万选择中，挑选适合你的武器。它们很快就会和大家见面。

part2.title: 使用VoxEdit创造自定义装备
part2.description: 装备是可以交易的代币。它们与其它ASSET一样，拥有CATALYST和GEM。是的，你也可以通过VoxEdit创造和铸造装备！

section6.title: 你还在等待什么？
section6.description: 已有成千上万的用户使用他们独一无二的人物造型注册《The Sandbox》，快来加入社区，和他们一起游戏吧。

section7.title: 你还在等待什么？
section7.description: 已有成千上万的用户使用他们独一无二的虚拟化身注册《The Sandbox》，快来加入社区，和他们一起游戏吧。

aboutLandSaleSystem.title: About the new LAND Sale System

1.title: How does the new LAND Sale System work?

paragraphs.1: We are redesigning our LAND Sale experience to give users more chances of buying LAND. Users will need to sign up for a raffle in order to get a chance of winning a whitelist spot in the upcoming LAND Sale. Only whitelisted users will be able to buy 1, and only 1 LAND over a 24 hour period.
paragraphs.2: There will be 1 whitelist spot for each LAND available, so every user who wins the raffle gets a chance of buying LAND. Whitelisted users will be able to buy 1 {random} LAND (based on the raffle they joined: Premium Raffle, Regular Raffle). Users will be able to join one, or both lists, but they will only be able to win either a Premium whitelist spot or Regular whitelist spot, not both.
paragraphs.3: When the 24 hours whitelist window ends all remaining lands will be manually set for auction (auction will start 1 day after the land sale ends).
paragraphs.4: To join the LAND Sale you need to meet the following requirements:
paragraphs.5: We WILL NOT charge users for joining the raffle, we will only check their SAND balance so we make sure users are ready to buy if they win the WL spot.

2.title: Who can join the LAND Sale?
2.paragraph: Users need to have a Sandbox account (with wallet linked) and meet the following requirements to be eligible to joining the LAND Sale:

3.title: Can I join the LAND Sale if I don't Verify my account?
3.paragraph: No, only verified accounts can join the LAND Sale. Make sure you verify your account in time. You can start your verification process here: {link}

4.title: How to get whitelisted for the LAND Sale?
4.paragraph: You can win a whitelist spot for the LAND Sale through the LAND Sale Raffle. Every winner of the LAND Sale Raffle will be able to min 1 RANDOM LAND.

5.title: At what time does the LAND Sale start?

paragraphs.1: {landSaleName} LAND Sale schedule:

2.1: LAND Sale Raffle Sign up: {startDate} to {endDate}

3.paragraph: {landSaleSecondChance} supply will depend on how many whitelisted users decide not to buy LAND

6.title: How can I know if I win a whitelist spot for the LAND Sale?
6.paragraph: The Raffle results will be announced on {date}. After that time you can enter the LAND Sale page ({link}) to find out if you won, make sure you are logged in. Winners will also receive an email notice.

7.title: Where can I find out more about upcoming LAND Sales?

paragraphs.1: All upcoming LAND Sales will be hosted on {link}.
paragraphs.2: We’ll announce upcoming LAND Sales over social media, on our home page and on the map. Users subscribed to The Sandbox will also receive email communications when a new LAND Sale is coming.

1.title: When does the LAND Sale Raffle take place?

paragraphs.1: LAND Sale Raffle dates:

1.paragraph: {landSaleSignUp} November 17 3:00 PM UTC to November 21 1:00 PM UTC

3.1: Find the full LAND Sale schedule here: {link}
3.link: At what time does the LAND Sale start?

2.title: Where can I sign up for the LAND Sale Raffle?

paragraphs.1: To sign up for the LAND Sale Raffle you need to:

3.1: Click ENTER RAFFLE (make sure you meet all the requirements)
3.2: If you don’t have your account verified you can start the process right there or by accessing {link}
3.3: To buy SAND please click on the CTA BUY SAND. You can also buy SAND (on polygon) by clicking on the SAND icon in the top right hand corner. Make sure you select {polygon} network

2.4: Select the raffle you want to join, Regular, Premium or both

3.title: Do I need to pay to join the LAND Sale Raffle?
3.paragraph: No, you don’t need to pay to enter the Raffle. We just check that you have at least 1011 SAND (on polygon) in your wallet, but it won’t trigger any transaction.

4.title: Is there any way to increase my chances of winning the LAND Sale Raffle?

paragraphs.1: The more LAND Sale Raffle tickets you have, the more chances you get to win the raffle. 1 Ticket = 1 Chance of winning the raffle, just like Alpha Seasons.
paragraphs.2: Here are the current ticket rules:

3.1: Signup for the Land Sale Raffle = 1 Ticket

paragraphs.4: Please note that ticket rules can change from LAND sale to LAND sale. The Sandbox will keep the community updated.
paragraphs.5: Please note that ticket rules can change from LAND sale to LAND sale. The Sandbox will keep the community updated.

5.title: Are there any requirements to enter the LAND Sale Raffle?

paragraphs.1: Users must meet the following requirements when i) signing up for the raffle, ii) The Sandbox runs the raffle to get the winners:
paragraphs.2: Please note that The Sandbox will not charge you to enter the raffle. Having 1,011 SAND in your wallet only proves that you’ll be able to purchase the LAND if you get selected.

6.title: What should I do if I win the LAND Sale Raffle?
6.paragraph: If you win the LAND Sale Raffle it means that you have a whitelist spot for minting 1 LAND once the LAND Sale starts. Just make sure you log into your account and enter {link} to check when the LAND Sale starts.

7.title: If I win the LAND Sale Raffle, when can I purchase my LAND?
7.paragraph: As soon as the LAND Sale starts you can enter {link} and mint your LAND. The minting period will last for 24 hours, make sure you don’t miss the window.

8.title: If I win the LAND Sale Raffle, can I transfer / sell the whitelist spot to another account?
8.paragraph: No, if you win a whitelist spot you can not transfer it to another account.

9.title: How can I get SAND on Polygon?

paragraphs.1: If you have SAND on Ethereum you can bridge into Polygon. Read how you can bridge SAND below or enter {link}.
paragraphs.2: You can buy SAND directly on polygon, click the SAND icon on the top bar and then BUY SAND. Make sure you switch to the Polygon network before selecting the purchase method.

10.title: How can I bridge SAND from the Ethereum network to Polygon?
10.paragraph: To bridge SAND from Ethereum to Polygon you can enter the bridge section under your account {link}. On the left you’ll see your SAND balance on Ethereum. You can bridge SAND to Polygon by clicking on Deposit.

1.title: How can I verify my Account?

paragraphs.1: To start the verification process go to Account > Settings > Account Verification or access {link}.
paragraphs.2: All you need is a smartphone (or laptop/tablet) with a camera, an internet connection, a well-lit room and your ID document.
paragraphs.3: To verify your account you need a Passport, National ID, Driver license or Resident Permit issued by the government can be submitted in your KYC process.

5.1: Have the 4 corners are clearly visible
5.2: Be in a good quality with all information clearly readable
5.3: Be valid: the document expiration is not exceeded
5.4: Not be handwritten (if your identity document is handwritten, it will be rejected)

2.title: Why do I need to Verify my account?

paragraphs.1: The KYC process (Know Your Customer) ensures that a real, physical person is behind the account. It proves that a person is who they claim to be. Required by current regulations, identification prevents a person from carrying out activities in the name of another person, using false documents to commit fraud (e.g. money laundering, identity theft, etc.).
paragraphs.2: The process consists first in a liveness proof, where we verify you are alive and you are a real person applying for the account verification. Then we require you to upload a document ID where we verify your identity.
paragraphs.3: Learn more about the Account Verification process {link}.

3.title: I joined the LAND Sale Raffle but I still don't have my account Verified, can I still win?

paragraphs.1: No, only Verified Accounts can win the LAND Sale Raffle. You can enter the raffle while your account is under verification, but you will only be eligible if your account gets verified before the raffle starts.
paragraphs.2: Account Verification might take up to 48 hours.

4.title: I have more questions about the Account Verification process (KYC)
4.paragraph: You can find more information about the Account Verification process here: {link}

1.title: What’s the price of LAND?
1.paragraph: Regular LAND costs 1,011 SAND; Premium LAND costs 4,683 SAND.

2.title: Do I need to pay for gas fees?
2.paragraph: The LAND Sale will be on Polygon, this means the gas price will be really low. Make sure you have some MATIC in your wallet.

3.title: Can I select which LAND I want to buy?
3.paragraph: No, the LANDs will be distributed randomly. Even if you entered the Premium raffle, you won’t be able to pick the LAND coordinates. Premium raffle winners will buy a RANDOM Premium LAND; Regular raffle winners will buy a RANDOM regular LAND.

4.title: If I win the LAND Sale Raffle, can LANDs sell out before I get to buy one?
4.paragraph: No, every winner will have the chance to buy 1 LAND. We’ll have the same amount of winners as LAND available, so if you win, you get a guaranteed purchase (as long as you buy within the minting window). After the minting window ends, your whitelist spot will no longer be valid.

5.title: Where do I mint my LAND?
5.paragraph: When the LAND Sale starts, all whitelisted users can access {link} to min their LAND. Log into your account and start the purchase process by clicking BUY LAND.

6.title: What happens if I win the raffle but I don't buy the LAND in time?
6.paragraph: All whitelist spots are only valid for one LAND Sale. After the LAND Sale ends, if you did not purchase any LAND, you can still get LAND in the Second Chance Auction, or at any time on the Secondary Market.

7.title: I didn’t win the LAND Sale Raffle, Is there any other way to get LAND?

paragraphs.1: Yes, if you did not win the LAND Sale Raffle you can still get LAND.

2.1: You can get a LAND through the Second Chance Auctions (If any whitelisted user decides not to buy LAND on the LAND sale)
2.2: Keep an eye on Second Chance Auctions here: {link}
2.4: Upcoming LAND Sale: Keep an eye on the LAND Sale schedule, there will be more chances to get LAND

8.title: If I win the LAND Sale Raffle and I don’t buy a LAND, can I buy a LAND on the next LAND Sale?
8.paragraph: All whitelist spots are only valid for one LAND Sale. If you want to buy LAND on the next LAND Sale, you need to sign up for the next LAND Sale Raffle and win a whitelist spot.

1.title: Does Premium LAND include a Premium NFT Bundle like previous LAND Sales?
1.paragraph: Yes, if you buy Premium LAND, you will get a special Premium NFT Bundle. The bundle will not be included in the initial purchase and it will be airdropped to your wallet after the LAND Sale is over.

2.title: What happens if I buy a Premium LAND and then sell the LAND before receiving the NFT Bundle airdrop?
2.paragraph: The Premium NFT Bundle will be sent to the user (wallet) who initially buys the PREMIUM LAND. If that user sells the LAND, the Premium NFT Bundle will still be sent to the original wallet.

3.title: Is there any chance to pick a brand and join the Premium Raffle?

1.title: What can I do with LAND at The Sandbox?

paragraphs.1: A LAND is a digital piece of real-estate in The Sandbox's metaverse. Game designers use LAND to build digital experiences, such as games or dioramas, and also populate it with ASSETs
paragraphs.2: Each LAND is a unique, non-fungible ERC-721 token on the Ethereum blockchain. A total of 166,464 LANDs will be available.
paragraphs.3: In the metaverse you can find REGULAR LAND and PREMIUM LAND.
paragraphs.5: Premium LAND owners get all the utility from REGULAR LAND plus:

premium.1: Get more SAND when you stake (2023)
premium.3: Attract more users into your experience

2.title: What’s the price of LAND?
2.paragraph: Regular LAND costs 1,011 SAND; Premium LAND costs 4,683 SAND.

3.title: What’s the difference between Regular and Premium LAND?

paragraphs.1: Premium LANDs are located next to a Partner’s ESTATE and grant to its buyer several Premium NFTs linked to the LAND sale’s partners. Premium NFTs get airdropped at the end of the sale.
paragraphs.2: For each wave, users will be able to enter the regular raffle, the Premium raffle, or both. But each user will only be able to win one whitelist spot per wave.
paragraphs.3: The Premium raffle will run first; if a user wins a Premium LAND whitelist spot and IF that user is also in the rRegular raffle, the user will be removed from the regular raffle. The regular raffle will run after the Premium raffle.

4.title: What does it mean that now LAND is on Polygon?

paragraphs.1: Hosting the LAND sales on Layer 2 will lower gas fees for each transaction and offer seamless gasless systems through Biconomy. Thanks to the combination of our upcoming raffle system and gasless fees we aim at providing a less frustrating buying experience for our future LAND sales while giving more people a chance to participate.
paragraphs.2: Learn more about Polygon: {link}
paragraphs.link: The Sandbox is deploying on Polygon

5.title: From now on, LAND Sales will be on Polygon?
5.paragraph: Yes, all LAND Sales will be on Polygon. Make sure you have your SAND on Polygon ready.

1.title: I can’t enter the raffle, it says I need to have 1011 SAND. I checked my wallet and I have 1011 SAND
1.paragraph: To enter the raffle you need to have 1011 SAND in Polygon. Some users might have SAND in ethereum. If you have SAND in ethereum you can {bridgeToPolygon} or you can {buyInPolygon}.

2.title: I have SAND in Ethereum, how can I bridge SAND from the Ethereum network to Polygon?
2.paragraph: To bridge SAND from Ethereum to Polygon you can enter the bridge section under your account {link}. On the left you’ll see your SAND balance on Ethereum. You can bridge SAND to Polygon by clicking on {deposit}.

3.title: I bought LAND but when I go into the Map I don’t see it assigned to my account
3.paragraph: After the transaction is approved it might take between 3-10 minutes for the metadata to be updated. Try refreshing the site after 10 minutes.

sandbox.title: 什么是《The Sandbox》（SAND）
sandbox.text1: 《The Sandbox》是基于Ethereum区块链打造的虚拟元宇宙，玩家可以在这个世界使用平台的功能型代币SAND来创造、建立自己的游戏体验，并赚取收益。玩家可以创造非同质化代币 (NFT) 的数字ASSET，并上传至市场，然后用Game Maker游戏制作工具将ASSET整合至游戏中。
sandbox.text2: LAND是《The Sandbox》元宇宙中的数字不动产，玩家购买后可在LAND上打造各种游戏体验。当玩家拥有LAND之后，便能在LAND上添加游戏和ASSET。多块LAND可合并成ESTATE。
sandbox.text3: 《The Sandbox》元宇宙的地图中，共有166,464块永久可用的LAND。
sandbox.text4: GEM和CATALYST决定了ASSET的层级、稀缺性和属性。CATALYST会为NFT添加空的GEM槽位。CATALYST的品质越高，ASSET的槽位也就越多。
sandbox.text5: 用户在平台上可使用以下方式将所花时间转变为收益，且保有95%的SAND作为收益率：

1.title: 出售ASSET
1.description: 用户可以创造ASSET，并在市场上将ASSET以NFT形式出售。

2.title: 拥有LAND
2.description: 在LAND出售活动中购买LAND。玩家可出租LAND，或是在上面添加内容以提升LAND价值。

3.title: 用Game Maker打造游戏
3.description: 在玩家持有的LAND上，用Game Maker打造游戏，获取收益。

sandbox.text6: 《The Sandbox》使用ERC-1776代币，让平台用户可以通过Ethereum区块链进行交易。为了优化整体用户体验，交易矿工费由平台支付。
sandbox.text7: 50%的SAND总交易量、LAND出售时扣除的费用、优质NFT出售、交易费和订阅服务所产生的收益都将拨入基金会
sandbox.text8: 基金会支持《The Sandbox》的生态系统，致力于提升NFT、元宇宙和$SAND使用的关注度。

foundation.1: 管理Game Maker基金和创作者基金，提供补贴来鼓励创作《The Sandbox》中的优质内容和游戏制作。
foundation.2: 资助超过17个游戏项目，其中一些游戏已经公开发布在
foundation.3: 发放补贴给100位艺术家，让他们创作NFT，大部分作品已发布在
foundation.4: 通过社区奖励和大使计划，支持当地社区主管，提升《The Sandbox》、NFT和区块链游戏的全球关注度
foundation.5: 为《The Sandbox》团队举办的各类比赛（VoxEdit比赛和Game Jams）赞助奖项，激发全球用户的创造力，吸引他们使用我们平台的工具。
foundation.6: 支持边玩边赚联赛与跨游戏活动，鼓励大家广泛使用SAND。

lands.title: How to buy a LAND
lands.text: The Sandbox Metaverse is made up of LAND owned by players to create and monetize experiences. There will only ever be 166,464 LANDs available, which can be used to host games, build multiplayer experiences, create housing, or offer social experiences to the community. You can buy LANDs during our public sales or at OpenSea.

chainSettings.text: 《The Sandbox》元交易在Polygon网络上推出了新功能。现在，所有交易均可整合，且使用唯一代币SAND。

chainSettings.textGasless: 《The Sandbox》通过Biconomy在Polygon网络上每月提供一定数量的免矿工费交易。这样一来，你就可以在无需支付矿工费的情况下执行一些必要交易。

1.title: 这是你第一次铸造吗？
1.description: 建议你阅读此短文，了解更多详情。

description.line01: 前往CATALYST与GEM商店的按钮即将显示。
description.line02: 购买过程可能花费几分钟。

uploadLand.uploadLandName: 在此处自定义你的LAND名称

section1.title: 建造、拥有，并主导你的游戏命运

paragraphs.1: 《The Sandbox》让你有机会打造游戏史上的杰作。加入我们非同寻常的元宇宙，拥有你打造的所有作品，并用它们赚取收益。
paragraphs.2: 我们的平台基于Ethereum区块链，且使用SAND作为主要功能型代币。你可以使用这种代币购买LAND、创造数字ASSET，以及将它们上传至市场进行交易。或使用你的ASSET，在《The Sandbox》的Game Maker中打造游戏体验。操作简单，你无需任何编程经验。
paragraphs.3: 当其他玩家购买你的ASSET，或游玩你的游戏，你将获得SAND收益。这种去中心化的出色经济会对你的参与予以奖励。
paragraphs.4: 如果对打造内容和赚取收益不感兴趣，你也可以探索这个浩瀚的虚拟世界，看看其他玩家是如何打造他们的LAND。随着我们社区的发展，还有更多令人激动的新角色、景观和游戏内容，让这款游戏更有吸引力，趣味性，而且变化多端。

paragraphs.1: 《The Sandbox》元宇宙被分割成了166,464块LAND，这些具有创意的沙盒区域属于你们，即玩家所有。你可以在你的LAND上创造在线游戏，赚取收益，或是出租LAND给其他玩家，让他们发布自己的作品。每块LAND都有预先设定的默认地形，但在打造你自己的内容时刻修改地形。

section3.title: 用户原创内容经济
paragraphs: 三大技术将共同支持你的用户原创内容（UGC）。你在《The Sandbox》上创造的所有内容的版权都归你所有，区块链和智能合约会证明你的所有权。你可以使用的三款整合型UGC产品为：
list: VoxelEdit，可创建体素模型、装配模型，使其快速动态化
市场，可查看或交易那些应用到你LAND上的ASSET
Game Maker，打造、分享你的在线游戏，并用它们赚取收益

section4.title: 加入大名鼎鼎的游戏合作伙伴
paragraphs: 《The Sandbox》已与超过50个领先品牌合作开发加密游戏内容，我们的伙伴包括：Shaun the Sheep、ATARI和Square Enix。你可以在游戏地图（请查看主菜单）上看到这些合作伙伴，此外，还有成千上万的个人用户也在筹划自己的创作内容。有许多不动产物品等待着新玩家入手。

staking.whyPolygonText: 《The Sandbox》正在转向使用Polygon，获得快速且高效的方式来管理区块链交易。Ethereum和Polygon之间会搭建跨链桥来实现传输。

staking.bridgeNotAvailable: Polygon跨链桥尚不支持你的钱包。请使用Metamask。如果你没有Metamask钱包，仍然可以在“未启用”上获得

migration.title: 迁移
migration.subTitle: LAND迁移
migration.text1: 由于2021年12月25日发现的漏洞，发现者为
migration.text2: ，我们在进行调查后决定进行修补，并加入全新的修复加强版LAND智能合约。更多内容请前往以下地址查看
migration.text3: 在此页面中，你可以从基于独特ID的全新智能合约中兑换等值LAND。此过程将锁定并废弃先前版本，以免今后产生任何混淆。
migration.text4: 如果在过程中需要任何帮助，你可以与我们取得联系：

01.question: 迁移何时开始？
01.answer: 迁移页面将于1月26日发布。

02.question: 如何迁移？
02.answer2: 并遵照指示。你需要登录你的钱包以及相关Sandbox账户。

03.question: 迁移有什么用处？
03.answer: 迁移页面将列出所有者的全部LAND。在登记交易之后，智能合约将锁定旧合约中的LAND，并在新合约中为所有者铸造等值LAND。

04.question: 费用是多少？
04.answer: 无需付费。我们将不收取矿工费，为用户提供免费交易。

05.question: 需要花费多长时间？
05.answer: 在登记交易后，迁移将通过网络在几分钟之内完成。

06.question: 有时间限制吗？
06.answer: 目前没有。我们希望给大家足够时间去迁移LAND。

07.question: 我如何知道还有哪个LAND需要迁移至新合约？
07.answer2: ，你可以查看到各个合约中包含的全部LAND。

08.question: 在迁移后，如何找到我的LAND？
08.answer: 你的LAND将会被铸造至相同钱包中，你可以在《The Sandbox》物品栏或任何钱包读取器中查找。

09.question: 如果我的LAND在离线钱包中该怎么办？
09.answer: 你将按照相同流程转移ASSET，我们支持大部分硬件钱包。Trezor和其它钱包在EIP-712遇到困难时，你可以在迁移页面中打勾，更改签名格式。

10.question: 如果我的LAND被质押在智能合约中该怎么办？
10.answer: 你需要从智能合约中提取LAND后再进行迁移。

11.question: 在交易时遇到错误我该怎么办？
11.answer: 我们一般会修复所有错误。但若你遇见意外错误，请与我们联系，联系方式为

12.question: 迁移页面说我有多个交易需要登记，这是正常情况吗？
12.answer: 是的。如果你拥有多个LAND，因为矿工费的限制，合约可能会以数笔交易进行。这是正常情况，且全部交易费用将由《The Sandbox》承担。

13.question: 迁移合约的地址在哪里？

15.question: 如果我在迁移开始后，通过旧合约购买了一个LAND，将会如何？
15.answer: 别担心，你依然可以迁移此LAND。你将拥有实时所有权，而非快照。

16.question: 如果我没有ETH进行迁移该怎么办？
16.answer: 迁移无需支付矿工费，所以不需要任何ETH。我们将承担所有支出。

header.title: LAND
header.paragraph: 《The Sandbox》元宇宙由LAND构成，持有LAND的玩家可用它来进行创作，并赚取收益。可用LAND的数量永远为166,464块，它们可用来举办游戏、打造多人游戏体验、建造房屋，或为社区提供社交体验

carousel.title: 你在《The Sandbox》中能用NFT LAND做什么

item1.title: 购买LAND
item1.content: 从购买LAND开始。使用LAND打造任何你能想象的东西。

item2.title: 创建
item2.content: 创造NFT ASSET、游戏、体验和更多内容。

item3.title: 盈利
item3.content: 在NFT市场出售你的作品，或收取使用费来盈利。

item1.title: 从未购买过LAND？
item1.content: 它比你想象中还要简单！查看我们丰富的在线资源可了解更多详情。加入我们的Discord服务器，直接与《The Sandbox》社区成员讨论你的问题。

item2.title: 什么是《The Sandbox》？
item2.content: 是一个以实体现金经济为基础的多人游戏虚拟世界。玩家即是创造者，能打造任何自己想象的作品。立即注册！

playToEarn.title: 边玩边赚
playToEarn.content: 免费游玩已经是2010年的概念啦……在《The Sandbox》中，你可以利用自创游戏来获取收益！我们为玩家和创作者打造的模型实现了边玩边赚的模式，让大家更有动力体验游戏，并创作出具有现实价值的奖励。
playToEarn.subtitle: 如何在《The Sandbox》中获取收益？

zero.title: 流动性挖矿
zero.paragraph1: 在《The Sandbox》的虚拟元宇宙里，玩家可以游玩、打造、拥有，并用虚拟体验获取收益。你可以将你的加密货币用于投资，获得更多SAND

first.title: 探索《The Sandbox》
first.paragraph1: 在《The Sandbox》的虚拟元宇宙里，玩家可以游玩、打造、拥有，并用虚拟体验获取收益。我们让艺术家、创作者和玩家能够打造自己梦寐以求的平台，为大家提供挥洒创意的方式。

second.title: 成为LAND所有者
second.paragraph1: LAND是《The Sandbox》元宇宙的组成元素，能为玩家提供专属内容，并让玩家能用《The Sandbox》元宇宙中自己的创作内容赚取收益。打造体验、举办活动、邀请好友。
second.newParagraph: Get a piece of LAND from The Sandbox metaverse to host your experience and events, access exclusive content and farming perks, and get premium defi staking and monetization options.

third.title: 为何使用SAND？
third.paragraph1: $SAND是我们主要的功能型代币，你可以用它在《The Sandbox》的元宇宙中买卖LAND和ASSET。

fourth.title: NFT
fourth.paragraph1: 非同质化代币 (NFT) 是一种存储在区块链上的虚拟代币，具有数字稀缺性、安全性和真实性等特点。它们独一无二、不可分割，且无法互换，能让游戏内ASSET真正拥有数字所有权。

privacyPolicy.text88: Certain information is collected by most browsers or automatically through your device, such as your Media Access Control (MAC) address, computer type (Windows or Mac), screen resolution, operating system name and version, device manufacturer and model, language, Internet browser type and version and the name and version of the Services you are using.  We use this information to ensure that the Services function properly.
privacyPolicy.text90: Cookies are pieces of information stored directly on the computer that you are using.  Cookies allow us to collect information such as browser type, time spent on the Services, pages visited, language preferences, mouse clicks, page scrolls, keystrokes, and other traffic data.  We and our service providers use the information for security purposes, to facilitate navigation, to display information more effectively, and to personalize your experience.  We also gather statistical information about use of the Services in order to continually improve their design and functionality, understand how they are used, and assist us with resolving questions regarding them. Cookies further allow us to select which of our advertisements or offers are most likely to appeal to you and display them while you are on the Services.  We may also use cookies or other technologies in online advertising to track responses to our ads.  We do not currently respond to browser do-not-track signals. If you do not want information collected through the use of cookies, most browsers allow you to automatically decline cookies or be given the choice of declining or accepting a particular cookie (or cookies) from a particular website.  You may also wish to refer to
privacyPolicy.text90part2: . If, however, you do not accept cookies, you may experience some inconvenience in your use of the Services.  You also may not receive advertising or other offers from us that are relevant to your interests and needs.
privacyPolicy.text91: Pixel tags and other similar technologies.
privacyPolicy.text92: Pixel tags (also known as web beacons and clear GIFs) may be used to, among other things, track the actions of users of the Services (including email recipients), measure the success of our marketing campaigns, and compile statistics about usage of the Services and response rates.

text93.mainText: {0}. privacyPolicy.text94: Uses and Disclosures of Other Information
privacyPolicy.text95: We may use and disclose Other Information for any purpose, except where we are required to do otherwise under applicable law.  If we are required to treat Other Information as Personal Information under applicable law, we may use and disclose it for the purposes for which we use and disclose Personal Information as detailed in this Policy.  In some instances, we may combine Other Information with Personal Information.  If we do, we will treat the combined information as Personal Information as long as it is combined.
privacyPolicy.text97: We seek to use reasonable organizational, technical and administrative measures to protect Personal Information within our organization.  Unfortunately, no data transmission or storage system can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.  If you have reason to believe that your interaction with us is no longer secure, please immediately notify us in accordance with the “Contacting Us” section below.
privacyPolicy.text99: Your choices regarding our use and disclosure of your Personal Information
privacyPolicy.text100: We give you choices regarding our use and disclosure of your Personal Information for marketing purposes.  If you no longer want to receive marketing related emails from us on a going-forward basis, you may opt out by clicking the unsubscribe link in such email.
privacyPolicy.text101: We will try to comply with your request(s) as soon as reasonably practicable.  Please note that if you opt out of receiving marketing related emails from us, we may still send you important administrative messages, from which you cannot opt out.
privacyPolicy.text102: How you can access, change, or delete your Personal Information
privacyPolicy.text103: If you would like to request to access, correct, update, suppress, restrict, or delete Personal Information, object to or opt out of the processing of Personal Information, or if you would like to request to receive a copy of your Personal Information for purposes of transmitting it to another company (to the extent these rights are provided to you by applicable law), you may contact us in accordance with the “Contacting Us” section below.  We will respond to your request consistent with applicable law.  In your request, please make clear what Personal Information you would like to have changed or whether you would like to have your Personal Information suppressed from our database.  For your protection, we may only implement requests with respect to the Personal Information associated with the particular email address that you use to send us your request, and we may need to verify your identity before implementing your request.  We will try to comply with your request as soon as reasonably practicable.
privacyPolicy.text104: Please note that we may need to retain certain information for recordkeeping purposes and/or to complete any transactions that you began prior to requesting a change or deletion (e.g., when you make a purchase or enter a promotion, you may not be able to change or delete the Personal Information provided until after the completion of such purchase or promotion).
privacyPolicy.text106: We retain Personal Information for as long as needed or permitted in light of the purpose(s) for which it was obtained and consistent with applicable law.
privacyPolicy.text107: The criteria used to determine our retention periods include:
privacyPolicy.text108: The length of time we have an ongoing relationship with you and provide the Services to you (for example, for as long as you have an account with us or keep using the Services);
privacyPolicy.text109: Whether there is a legal obligation to which we are subject (for example, certain laws require us to keep records of your transactions for a certain period of time before we can delete them); or
privacyPolicy.text110: Whether retention is advisable in light of our legal position (such as in regard to applicable statutes of limitations, litigation or regulatory investigations).
privacyPolicy.text112: The Services are not directed to individuals under the age of eighteen (18), and we do not knowingly collect Personal Information from individuals under 18.
privacyPolicy.text114: Your Personal Information may be stored and processed in any country where we have facilities or in which we engage service providers, and by using the Services you understand that your information will be transferred to countries outside of your country of residence, including the United States, which may have data protection rules that are different from those of your country.  In certain circumstances, courts, law enforcement agencies, regulatory agencies or security authorities in those other countries may be entitled to access your Personal Information.
privacyPolicy.text115: ADDITIONAL INFORMATION REGARDING THE EEA AND THE UK: Some non-EEA countries are recognized by the European Commission as providing an adequate level of data protection according to EEA standards (the full list of these “specified countries” is available at:
privacyPolicy.text115part2: . The UK recognizes the EEA and the specified countries as providing an adequate level of data protection according to UK standards.  For transfers from the EEA or the UK to countries not considered adequate by the European Commission or the UK government (as applicable), we have put in place adequate measures, such as standard contractual clauses adopted by the relevant authority to protect your Personal Information. You may obtain a copy of these measures by contacting us in accordance with the “Contact Us” section below.
privacyPolicy.text117: Unless we request it, we ask that you not send us, and you not disclose, any sensitive Personal Information (e.g., social security numbers, information related to racial or ethnic origin, political opinions, religion or other beliefs, health, biometrics or genetic characteristics, criminal background, or trade union membership) on or through the Services or otherwise to us.
privacyPolicy.text119: The Services may provide functionality allowing you to make payments to TSB Gaming using third-party payment services with which you have created your own account.  When you use such a service to make a payment to us, your Personal Information will be collected by such third party and not by us, and will be subject to the third party’s privacy policy, rather than this Privacy Policy.  We have no control over, and are not responsible for, this third party’s collection, use, and disclosure of your Personal Information.
privacyPolicy.text121: The “LAST UPDATED” legend at the top of this Privacy Policy indicates when this Privacy Policy was last revised.  Any changes will become effective when we post the revised Privacy Policy on the Services.
privacyPolicy.text123: TSB Gaming Limited, located at Ground Floor, Church Street, St. Julians, STJ 3049, Malta, is the company responsible for collection, use, and disclosure of your Personal Information under this Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicy.text124: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [privacy@sandbox.game], or TSB Gaming Limited, Ground Floor, Church Street, St. Julians, STJ 3049, Malta.
privacyPolicy.text125: Because email communications are not always secure, please do not include credit card or other sensitive information in your emails to us.
