privacyPolicy.text148: As described above, we collect these categories of Personal Information from you and from crypto wallet providers, when they share the information with us.
privacyPolicy.text150: As described above, we use these categories of Personal Information to operate, manage, and maintain our business, to provide our products and services, and to accomplish our business purposes and objectives, including using Personal Information to:
privacyPolicy.text151: Fulfill your requests and respond to your inquiries;
privacyPolicy.text152: Develop, improve, repair, provide and maintain our products and services;
privacyPolicy.text153: Personalize, advertise, and market our products and services;
privacyPolicy.text154: Conduct research, analytics, data analysis, data aggregation, and data anonymization;
privacyPolicy.text155: Maintain our property and our records, and undertake quality and safety assurance measures;
privacyPolicy.text156: Conduct risk and security control and monitoring, and detect and prevent fraud;
privacyPolicy.text157: Perform identity verification, accounting, audit, and other internal functions, such as internal investigations and record-keeping;
privacyPolicy.text158: Carry out corporate transactions, such as mergers, joint ventures or acquisitions; and
privacyPolicy.text159: Comply with law, legal process, and internal policies, and exercise and defend legal claims.
privacyPolicy.text161: If you are a California resident, you may request that we:
privacyPolicy.text162: Disclose to you the following information covering the 12 months preceding your request:
privacyPolicy.text163: The categories of Personal Information we collected about you and the categories of sources from which we collected such Personal Information;
privacyPolicy.text164: The specific pieces of Personal Information we collected about you;
privacyPolicy.text165: The business or commercial purpose for collecting (if applicable) Personal Information about you; and
privacyPolicy.text166: The categories of Personal Information about you that we otherwise shared or disclosed, and the categories of third parties with whom we shared or to whom we disclosed such Personal Information (if applicable).
privacyPolicy.text167: Delete Personal Information we collected from you.
privacyPolicy.text168: To make a request for the disclosures or deletion described above, please contact us at privacy@sandbox.game.  We will verify and respond to your request consistent with applicable law, taking into account the type and sensitivity of the Personal Information subject to the request.  We may need to request additional Personal Information from you, such as email address or wallet address, in order to verify your identity (via email PIN confirmation) to protect against fraudulent requests.  If you make a deletion request, we may ask you to confirm your request before we delete your Personal Information.
privacyPolicy.text169: You have the right to be free from unlawful discriminatory treatment for exercising your rights under the CCPA.
privacyPolicy.text171: If you want to make a request as an authorized agent on behalf of a California resident, you may use the submission methods noted above.  As part of our verification process, we may request that you provide, as applicable, proof concerning your status as an authorized agent, which may include:

privacyPolicy.text173: Proof of a power of attorney from the resident pursuant to Probate Code sections 4121-4130;
privacyPolicy.text174: Signed permission that the resident has authorized you to make a request on the resident’s behalf.
privacyPolicy.text175: If you are an authorized agent and have not provided us with a power of attorney from the resident pursuant to Probate Code sections 4121-4130, we may also require the resident to:
privacyPolicy.text176: Verify the resident’s own identity directly with us; or
privacyPolicy.text177: Directly confirm with us that the resident provided you permission to make the request.

bannerMiddle.subtitle1: 一个由玩家打造的虚拟世界
bannerMiddle.paragraph1: 同时具备单人游戏和多人游戏的游戏体验。使用Voxedit 3D创建并动态化ASSET。使用Game Maker工具在《The Sandbox》元宇宙中打造独一无二的游戏体验。在市场上购买并出售ASSET，提升你的游戏体验。
bannerMiddle.paragraph6: 在《The Sandbox》中，唯一的限制便是你的想象力。

bannerMiddle.paragraph2: 在12月的LAND出售活动中，获得你的土地并进入The Sandbox
bannerMiddle.paragraph3: 持有任何Snoop通行证均可被自动添加至2022年初推出的Snoop Dogg虚拟化身收藏白名单中。你将化身Dogg，漫游元宇宙！

definitions.description: Doggy是一种非同质化代币收藏，由10.000个程序化生成的Snoop Doggs构成，可在《The Sandbox》中使用。每个Snoop都是独一无二的，由The Sandbox熟练的体素艺术家从150多个特征中手工制作而成。

metaverseReady.description: 从即将推出的Alpha赛季2开始，每个人物造型都可在《The Sandbox》中使用。获取你的人物造型，进入游戏，与世界分享你的人物造型！

chanceUniqueAvatars.description: 首个出现在元宇宙音乐视频中的人物造型。独一无二、手工制作且可玩性高的Doggy即将在《The Sandbox》中推出。由狗爷亲自设计制作。
chanceUniqueAvatars.descriptionUnique1: 由《The Sandbox》团队以及Snoop Dogg本人订制设计的一组酷炫、新奇又时髦的人物造型。每个体验中仅存在一个化身，谁会成为那位幸运儿呢？
chanceUniqueAvatars.descriptionUnique2: 漫步在Snoop Dogg的历史中，寻找多个独特人物造型。每个人物造型都和Snoop历年来最佳单曲密切相关。
chanceUniqueAvatars.descriptionUnique3: 我们与全世界多个最伟大的收藏合作，将数个独特的1比1的Doggy带到元宇宙中，以供玩家在《The Sandbox》中游玩体验。

banner.title: Alpha赛季
banner.subtitle: 游玩
banner.description: 一览元宇宙的风貌，让玩家，也就是你，能在自己的LAND上创建并举办各种精彩活动。欢迎！

topInfos.title: 《The Sandbox》
topInfos.paragraph: 《The Sandbox》是一个虚拟元宇宙，玩家可以在这个巨大的虚拟世界中建造、拥有自己的游戏体验和ASSET，并以它们来赚取收益。《The Sandbox》提供了一套量身定制的工具，让玩家能够聚集在一起，创造富有吸引力的元宇宙体验。

intro.title: 《The Sandbox》很高兴能发布首个封测Alpha版本！
intro.description: 请别忘记，我们的生态系统仍在制作中，所以你可能会遇到一些问题和错漏。我们的主要目的在于测试服务器构架、社区管理和用户流。请在我们网站的Alpha专区提供反馈，帮助我们改善游戏体验。
intro.subtitle: 祝大家游戏愉快

alpha.title: Alpha

1.subtitle: 游玩Alpha版本

paragraphs.1: Alpha版本欢迎所有玩家的加入！在单人和多人游戏中，探索惊奇且独特的虚拟世界。
paragraphs.2: 针对所有人开放！
paragraphs.4: 你可以前往Alpha中心，参与3个游戏体验进行探索，并在《The Sandbox》社区中互动。
paragraphs.7: 可参与全部18个Alpha版本专属游戏体验，并获得最多
paragraphs.8: 1,000 SAND与3份非同质化代币奖励！

2.subtitle: 进入Alpha版本

paragraphs.1: 你需要获得Alpha通行证才可体验Alpha赛季的全部内容，并获得奖励
paragraphs.2: 如何获得Alpha通行证：
paragraphs.subtitle2: 提供给社区的Alpha通行证限量发行5,000份。
paragraphs.4: LAND所有者可注册抽奖，获得赢取Alpha通行证的机会。
paragraphs.6: 参加我们的社交媒体平台、推特、Twitch和YouTube上的每日社交比赛，所有人都有机会赢取Alpha Pass！
paragraphs.8: 与社交媒体内容参与体验。
paragraphs.12: 你就可以前往OpenSea购买Alpha通行证。
paragraphs.13: 如果你没有Alpha通行证，你仍然可以前往中心，四处探索。

paragraphs.1: 完成简单任务，获得极具价值的SAND与非同质化代币！

alpha.subtitle1: 游玩Alpha版本，并获得1,000 SAND + 3份非同质化代币
alpha.subtitle2: 开放时间：2021年11月29日至12月20日
alpha.subtitle3: 如何运作？你能做什么？又能获取什么？我们会将一切都告知你！

rewards.title: 关于奖励的一切
rewards.paragraph: 如何运作？你能做什么？又能获取什么？我们会将一切都告知你！

reward.title: 奖励
reward.subtitle: +1.000 SAND
reward.paragraph2: 每位玩家可至多赢得1,000 SAND。也就是说，我们会有1,000位赢家！

explore.title: 探索我们的最佳关卡
explore.subtitle: 你在游戏中看见的一切都能在市场上购买。

hub.paragraph: 《The Sandbox》中心是元宇宙的中央地区。这里有展示了许多NTF的画廊、通往其它体验的入口、音乐会区域，以及我们三大团体居住的区域：神谕、英雄和科学家。

glitches.title: 元宇宙中的小故障
glitches.paragraph1: 我们还不知道是什么原因导致的这一现象，但你会经常遇到元故障，这些元故障出现在了不该出现的地方。
glitches.paragraph2: 这是结识他人，欣赏从未见过的NFT的好机会！

1.title: 总共有多少Doggy？
1.paragraph: There are 10,000 unique Snoop Avatars, programmatically generated from over 150 hand-crafted traits.

paragraphs.1: 总共将铸造10,000个程序化生成的「Doggy」人物造型。

2.title: 它们的稀有度/层级如何？
2.paragraph: Each avatar will unlock unique utility that goes beyond a simple NFT. They will be playable in The Sandbox, and can be used to unlock future mints, and features in the metaverse. In addition, they will be part of the first ever Snoop Dogg music video, happening in The Sandbox.

paragraphs.1: 根据特征，Doggy将分为若干种稀有度。不仅有多样化Doggy，还有10+手工制作的1比1 Doggy，包括酷炫、经典和招牌Doggy。

3.title: 我应该去哪里领取人物造型？
3.paragraph: Follow us on @TheSnoopAvatars on Twitter to find out how to get whitelisted and get your hands on an avatar before everyone else.

paragraphs.1: 唯一能够铸造人物造型的网址如下：
paragraphs.2: https://sandbox.game/en/snoopdogg/raffle/mint/

4.title: 何时开始出售？
4.paragraph: Winners will be informed through our social channels and/or Discords. Keep an eye out for more info.

paragraphs.1: 出售于2022年2月23日UTC时间晚上10点开始。
paragraphs.2: 白名单用户可提前24小时参与。

5.title: 一个Doggy NFT需要花费多少钱？

paragraphs.1: 一个Doggy NFT价值150 SAND。

6.title: 在同一个钱包地址中我可以铸造多少Doggy？

paragraphs.1: Doggy将以两个批次发行：
paragraphs.2: 1. 白名单用户可在2月22日至2月23日的24小时内铸造1个Doggy。
paragraphs.3: 2. 在公开发行开始后，用户可在2月23日至2月24日期间铸造多达10个Doggy。

7.title: 我何时才能见到我铸造的Doggy？

paragraphs.1: 完成铸造后，Doggy将在48小时候后于OpenSea上发布。

8.title: 我可以使用任何钱包（Binance和Ledger等等）进行铸造吗？

paragraphs.1: 可以，你可以使用任何钱包进行铸造。
从《The Sandbox》的Alpha赛季2开始，每个Doggy的人物造型都可在《The Sandbox》的多人游戏中使用。

10.title: 我应该如何在Alpha通行证期间使用我的Doggy？

paragraphs.1: 只需在《The Sandbox》人物造型管理器界面选中它，即可将它用作人物造型。

11.title: Doggy还能给我带来别的好处吗？

paragraphs.1: 部分被选中的Doggy所有者还有机会让他们的人物造型出现在即将发行的Snoop音乐视频中。这将是让你载入Snoop历史的绝佳机会。

12.title: 首发结束后，我该上哪儿去购买Doggy？

paragraphs.1: 首发结束后，你可以前往二级市场，从愿意割爱的用户手中购买Doggy。
paragraphs.2: OpenSea

13.title: 我如何才能加入白名单？

paragraphs.1: 如果你拥有下列NFT之一，在铸造开始前的24小时内，你可以抢先体验Doggy铸造：
paragraphs.2: - SnoopVerse抢先体验通行证

14.title: 我该如何知道自己加入了白名单？

paragraphs.1: 如果你拥有以上NFT之一，且该NFT位于你的钱包中，只要前往铸造界面你就可以进行铸造。

15.title: 身为白名单用户，我可以铸造多少个Doggy？

paragraphs.1: 作为白名单用户，你仅能铸造1个Doggy。

16.title: 我的Doggy还没有发布在OpenSea上。我该怎么做？

paragraphs.1: 如果你在2月24日UTC时间晚上10点前查看的，那便属于正常情况。如果是在此时间之后查看的，请点击位于OpenSea界面右上角的「刷新元数据」按钮。

17.title: 我第一次购买NFT，应该如何操作呢？

paragraphs.1: 购买过程非常简单。请先确认你已经
paragraphs.2: 在《The Sandbox》
paragraphs.4: 请确保你有足够的SAND用来铸造你想要铸造的Doggy数量，以及足够的ETH用来支付矿工费。
paragraphs.5: 登录你的账户，并前往铸造界面
paragraphs.7: 先检查你的钱包是否正常关联，然后按下「铸造」按钮即可取回你的Doggy。

footerText: Polygon is a PoS network, your tokens will be sent to the Polygon network in two steps.
After signing the first transaction you will have to wait 30 minutes for the networks to synchronize.

withdraw.headerSubTitle: Please select a SAND amount to transfer to Ethereum.
footerText: Your tokens will be sent back to the Ethereum network in two steps.
After signing the first transaction you will have to wait - 3-4 hours for the networks to synchronize.
Then you will be asked to sign a second transaction.

wait.headerSubTitle: Please wait until the transfer is confirmed.
wait.footerText: Depending on your settings, it takes between a few seconds to a few minutes to confirm.

route.headerSubTitle: Please wait until the transfer is completed.

deposit.footerText: It will take about 30 minutes to synchronize. Once the transfer is completed the funds will be available on Polygon.

withdraw.footerText: It will take about - 3-4 hours to synchronize. Once the checkpoint is reached, you will be prompted to sign a second transaction to complete the withdrawal.

checkpoint.headerSubTitle: Please sign the second transaction to complete the withdrawal

deposit.footerText: Your tokens have been successfully deposited to Polygon.

withdraw.footerText: Your tokens have been successfully withdrawn to Ethereum.

fail.footerText1: Something happened and the transaction was either rejected or reverted. Please retry.

sidebar.olderTransactions: For older pending transactions, please check the {0} {1}

bridge.noTransactions: There are no transactions to display
bridge.checkTransactions: Check previous transactions or confirm pending ones

0.title: Avatar
0.subtitle: The avatar now spawns from the Avatar’s portal, highlighted by the blue cursor.

0.title: You can now customize the avatar’s behavior, components, camera and model by going into the new GLOBAL PARAMETERS button. You also get access to this menu by clicking on the AVATAR SETTINGS button in the inspector while selecting the Avatar’s portal.

1.title: Avatar: In this menu, you can select which avatar’s type is spawned and add tags to it.

2.title: Camera: In this menu, you can easily change the camera views and customize each value to make the camera you want.

3.title: Controller: In this menu, you can change the avatar’s behavior values and add / remove components.

4.title: Lighting: In this menu, you can easily change between different lighting atmospheres.

1.title: Global Game Maker Improvements
1.subtitle: The Game Maker tools have been reworked and improved to provide a better user experience with a lot more functionalities.

0.title: The terraform tool is now easier to use. More options have also been added to it.

1.title: The way you place the assets in the experience has also been improved to allow you to easily add and manage your assets position and rotation.

2.title: Library
2.subtitle: The whole Library has been revamped to provide a better user experience. You can now quickly search and use filters to find what you need. Presets are now accessible within it and usable inside the Hotbar.

3.title: Selection Window
3.subtitle: The Selection Window has been revamped to provide a better user experience. You can now quickly search and use filters to find what you need. Behaviors and Components have now an Icon and a ToolTip for each of them, to make them easier to understand.

4.title: New Message System
4.subtitle: Instead of having to write or copy & paste text, the New Message System allows you to easily create a Message and re-use it anywhere you want.

5.title: Rules Window
5.subtitle: The Rules Window has been revamped to provide a better user experience. You can now collapse and uncollapse Quests, and manage them easily. You can also quickly define the information that you want to display within the Victory and Defeat screens.

0.title: The new Quest System allows you to fully customize the Quests

1.title: New options have been added to allow more customization and quests that have been done before should be easier to do now.

7.title: Indicator Component
7.subtitle: The Indicator Component has received a major update, related to the new Quest System and some other improvements

0.title: LifeBar color parameter has been removed to provide a more consistent User Experience within all Metaverse Experiences.

1.title: Objective Cursor parameter has been removed to provide a more consistent User Experience within all Metaverse Experiences.

2.title: The Quest Cursors are now split in 3 parameters: Giver, Objective, Receiver

8.title: Presets
8.subtitle: Creating a Preset has never been so easy. Select the Object you want to transform as a Preset, and click on the related button in the Toolbar to do so.  You can also easily replace an existing Preset by clicking on it when creating a new one. Plus, it is now possible to use Presets inside the Asset Spawner, which gives you more possibilities.

9.title: Tags
9.subtitle: The Tags related to Behaviors and Components have been changed. It might not change your current Experience functionalities as they will remain the same for already-created Experiences, but we suggest taking a look at them.

10.title: Publish
10.subtitle: You can now easily publish your Experience to the Gallery and allow other users to play to the content you created.

11.title: Behaviors and Components
11.subtitle: Behaviors and Components had their tooltips and parameters updated. They should now be easier to understand.

0.title: The balancing has been reworked to provide a better difficulty. Each object has now its difficulty mainly driven by its Catalyst and also its Gems.

1.title: Each Object has a Grade displayed next to its Lifebar. This Grade represents the Catalyst of the Object and the amount of Gems inside it. Thanks to this, Players can now identify the power of an Object easily.

0.title: The Enemy fighter behavior has been automatically replaced by the Melee Enemy behavior.

1.title: This behavior follows the same intentions as the previous one but has been improved to make the fights much more enjoyable.

2.title: A targeting system has been added to make your attacks move your avatar towards the enemies, emoving a previous frustrating experience with this.

14.title: Quest Icons
14.subtitle: As said before, a Quest is split into 4 steps. For 3 of them, a specific Quest Icon is displayed during the Play Mode.

15.title: Inventory & Equipment
15.subtitle: Players will be able to pick up equipment and quest items from experiences and save them in their local inventories. Equip different sets of items to change your character's attributes and become stronger.

16.title: Known Issues
16.subtitle: These are the following known issues for this version of the Game Maker

0.title: Some equipment types may cause experiences to seldomly crash while resetting them.

1.title: On some machines, 4x4 experiences may make the character not move properly.

2.title: If an experience uses unpublished assets, a “selection error” may occur inside the Gallery.

3.title: Experiences that use Loot or Asset Spawner components may cause a crash during gameplay.

4.title: Lighting presets may cause brightness issues on light blocks and assets.

5.title: Library load times may be longer than expected depending on the amount of assets the user has.

6.title: Some avatar body parts may look brighter in some environments.

7.title: Some inputs may be lost while hopping through experiences without opening the inventory beforehand.

0.title: Chat Bubbles (Multiplayer)
0.subtitle: We’ve added Chat Bubbles on top of the Avatar head. Whenever you or someone else types out something in the chat you’ll see a chat bubble on top of their heads if you are close enough to them. This is our first iteration of the feature, we’re planning on revamping the UI for the next release

1.title: NFT Inspect
1.subtitle: From the Inventory, you will be able to access a new Tab called NFT, here you can see a full list of NFT’s and ASSETS used inside an experience and identify what are the trending assets all creators are using.

2.title: Fighting System UI & VFX
2.subtitle: We’re constantly improving on our Avatar, Enemy and Combat Systems. This time we’ve added Visual queues to attacks that show damage numbers when hitting an enemy as well as blocking. We’ve also added and improved upon existing VFX to make combat queues much more clear.

3.title: UI Improvements
3.subtitle: We’ve made some UI/UX improvements across the board. We’ve added pop-ups, improved windows current flows and fixed issues with some screens that were not working optimally.

0.title: Global Game Maker Improvements
0.subtitle: Our main focus with this version was all about performance. We’ve still got ways to go before we can provide the absolute best experience possible but we’ve made quite a few changes in our architecture and you will be able to notice:

list.0: Faster loading and response times of the Game Maker Tools
list.1: Improved performance on different types of PC’s
list.2: Improved performance on bigger experiences with a large amount of assets

1.title: Library Improvements
1.subtitle: We’ve reworked the Library internal structure from scratch, in order to make it faster and smoother when loading and utilizing it. You will notice a big improvement from the previous version.

2.title: Lighting Presets
2.subtitle: We’ve added a new Neutral Lighting preset, in case you don’t want to use any of our current lighting options. We’ve also improved on the already existing presets, eliminating refraction errors on light surfaces as well as correcting color emanation.

3.title: Behaviors
3.subtitle: We’ve fixed some of the behaviors to make better use of our technical stack. Most of our known issues regarding the behavior system have been successfully addressed.

4.title: New Templates
4.subtitle: We’ve added three new experience templates for you to use and learn more about the Game Maker:

list.0: Logic - Behaviours: An experience that lets you test out the different behaviors we have and different ways to use them
list.1: Logic - Victory and Defeat: understand the basics of Victory and Defeat conditions in your game
list.2: Logic - Counter Quest: learn how to make a Death Counter and Collection Counter quest

5.subtitle: We’ve also added another 8 new experience templates without any logic for you to use as starting points:

0.title: Mini Map (Compass)
0.subtitle: We’ve added a new HUD element into our Play Mode in the form of a Mini Map, now you’ll be able to orientate yourself and be provided with specific experience data. This is a simplified version of our Mini Map, stay tuned to see the finalized version soon.

1.title: Gameplay Improvements
1.subtitle: As part of our constant improvements to the Gameplay and Combat system we’ve added the following features:

0.title: Heavy Attack Damage Zone:
0.subtitle: The heavy attack will now have a reticle that shows the area of effect of your attack, as you charge it more, it will deal more damage and the area will be bigger.

1.title: Stun System:
1.subtitle: Heavy Attacks charged up to its limit will now stun all enemies in range when released.

2.title: Parry System:
2.subtitle: You will be able to parry enemy attacks to reduce the damage you’ve taken. If your timing is right you’ll be able to Perfect Parry them, stunning the enemy in consequence.

0.title: NFT Images
0.subtitle: We’ve added the NFT Image component to the Game Maker. Now you’ll be able to add NFT images from Opensea:

list.0: Put them on Billboards and Picture frames to create an NFT environment or art Gallery
list.1: Showcase your owned NFT inside the Sandbox to the players and creators
list.2: Use the NFT Inventory feature to be able to see the NFT in Opensea

1.title: Play Mode Settings
1.subtitle: We’ve added settings to this version of the Game Maker in order to provide a better quality of life for users. In this iteration of the feature you’ll be able to:

list.3: View the play mode Control Scheme (We now support AZERTY too)

2.title: Version Check
2.subtitle: Now, everytime a new version of the Game Maker is available, our servers will check against your current installed version and request you to update to the newest version.

0.title: Fixed assets not fully loading even though they are seen in the experience, if the user switches to play before, they will be lost and several unwanted behaviours occurs. There is now a very small waiting timer before being able to switch to play.

1.title: Fixed several issues related to the Asset Rarity Counts

2.title: Validated not allowing to enter playmode, save, publish, share and go to home if experience not fully loaded.

3.title: Fixed nullref when trying to share or publish an experience with unpublished assets in it.

4.title: Fixed nullrefs when entering NTFs inventory with asset spawner set to "none" (default)

5.title: Fixed error not allowing to share/publish experience with drop component set to "none" (default)

0.title: Known Issues
0.subtitle: The following are the known issues for this version:

0.title: We’ve temporarily disabled the PRESET SYSTEM from the Game Maker due to various issues and crashes happening around its use. All experiences that currently use this feature will still be functional, but the presets won’t be modifiable any further. We’ll be working to get it back up as soon as possible.
Initial Equipment :
0.subtitle: A set of options was added on the Global Parameters Menu that lets users select the starting weapon and equipment the Avatar will commence an experience with.

1.title: Pre-Packaged Assets :
1.subtitle: From now on, we’ll be pre-loading assets into the Game Maker upon installation. This will help substantially with experience loading speeds, both on the Editor and the Gallery.

2.title: Version Check :
2.subtitle: Now, everytime a new version of the Game Maker is available, our servers will check against your current installed version and request you to update to the newest version.

0.title: Transportation Changes :
0.subtitle: We’re preparing various of our systems for some upcoming new releases. In order to enable new and exciting features regarding how players can move from an experience to another, we’ve made some architecture level changes into our current transportation and waygate system.

1.title: Server Templates :
1.subtitle: Previously, our Game Maker Templates were handled locally, now they’ll be held inside our servers so that we can update them in real time with new and exciting content as well as adding new templates without having to release a new Game Maker version.

0.title: Gameplay Improvements :
0.subtitle: As part of our constant improvements to the Gameplay and Combat system we’ve added the following features:

0.title: Fixed various issues that caused random application crashes.

1.title: Fixed various issues that caused the application to become unresponsive

3.title: Fixed various issues regarding Editor Usability

0.title: NFT Image Self Illumination :
0.subtitle: An option was added on the NFT Image Component that lets users select if the environment Illumination affects the NFT image or if it is Self Illuminated.

1.title: NFT Interact Component :
1.subtitle: Gives the creator the opportunity to let the players inspect the NFTs that have this behaviour added.

2.title: Gameplay Improvements :
2.subtitle: As part of our constant improvements to the Gameplay and Combat system we’ve added the following features:

0.title: Fixed various issues that caused random application crashes.

1.title: Fixed various issues that caused the application to become unresponsive

3.title: Fixed various issues regarding Editor Usability

Fixed various issues that caused random application crashes.

0.title: New canvas size limit, 256 voxels from 128.

1.title: You will be able to export models to obj format.

2.title: 2 new buttons had been added to the top bar: File & Edit:

3.title: File: Save, Open, Recent and Export functionalities.

5.title: Nice edges button added, which only show the edges of the voxels as a whole instead of block by block.

6.title: Ambient occlusion and SSAO: You will now able to notice a change on the way voxels are rendered.

7.title: Screenshots: You will find a new button on the modeler and rigger to take a Screenshot of your creations.

9.title: Performance may be affected by changes in the render(WIP)

1.title: Fixed OSX issues (various freezes and camera sensitivity)

2.title: Added poly count limit when exporting to the Marketplacet

10.title: Create, Paint and Delete with Left Mouse Button

11.title: Camera Orbit with Right Mouse Button

12.title: Camera Pan with Middle Mouse Button

13.title: All the Features and Fixes from private will be public now

15.title: Option to unify palettes for all VXM attached to a VXR

10.title: New UI for Select Animation Dropdown

3.title: Fixed Lights Parallel to Y axis

7.title: Fixed Material picking not upgrading Material text fields

8.title: Fixed Material Hex field not validating properly

10.title: Contextual Menus now keep whitin the window

1.title: Rebindable Shortcuts: Users can rebinding editor keys to define new keyboard shortcuts.

4.title: New camera panning shortcut with Space Bar.

6.title: Build Version name on Welcome screens.

7.title: Template Mode with interactive nodes for Avatar body parts.

8.title: Static mesh optimization/VXR8 (not used until game side implementation).

9.title: Error message feedback added in several places.

0.title: Keyboard now works in detached panels.

1.title: Added Long Way Rotation icon in Timeline.

2.title: Curve selection now affects all selected keyframes.

4.title: Textfields now support the Backspace key.

5.title: Erase mode preview does not glow anymore.

6.title: Zoom/Loop window sliders cannot be forced to have zero length.

7.title: Block face export as PNG now saves emissive material colors.

8.title: Inserting a keyframe now preserves interpolation at the insertion point.

9.title: Fixed text display with leading spaces.

10.title: Fixed crash when undoing a block face import action.

11.title: Fixed limitless text input in File Popup filename text field.

12.title: Fixed crash when copying keyframes out of timeline bounds.

13.title: Fixed crash when renaming or duplicating already attached models in the library.

14.title: Fixed panel layout when detaching Material panel in Block editor.

15.title: Fixed DAE export sometimes entering infinite loop.

16.title: Fixed position of Welcome screen's "Open File" button.

17.title: Fixed layout of Block Editor panel so it fits in lower screen resolutions.

18.title: Added error when importing VXM/VOX file with same name as already existing VXM.

0.title: Avatar
0.subtitle: The avatar now spawns from the Avatar’s portal, highlighted by the blue cursor.

0.title: You can now customize the avatar’s behavior, components, camera and model by going into the new GLOBAL PARAMETERS button. You also get access to this menu by clicking on the AVATAR SETTINGS button in the inspector while selecting the Avatar’s portal.

1.title: Avatar: In this menu, you can select which avatar’s type is spawned and add tags to it.

2.title: Camera: In this menu, you can easily change the camera views and customize each value to make the camera you want.

3.title: Controller: In this menu, you can change the avatar’s behavior values and add / remove components.

4.title: Lighting: In this menu, you can easily change between different lighting atmospheres.

1.title: Global Game Maker Improvements
1.subtitle: The Game Maker tools have been reworked and improved to provide a better user experience with a lot more functionalities.

0.title: The terraform tool is now easier to use. More options have also been added to it.

1.title: The way you place the assets in the experience has also been improved to allow you to easily add and manage your assets position and rotation.

2.title: Library
2.subtitle: The whole Library has been revamped to provide a better user experience. You can now quickly search and use filters to find what you need. Presets are now accessible within it and usable inside the Hotbar.

3.title: Selection Window
3.subtitle: The Selection Window has been revamped to provide a better user experience. You can now quickly search and use filters to find what you need. Behaviors and Components have now an Icon and a ToolTip for each of them, to make them easier to understand.

4.title: New Message System
4.subtitle: Instead of having to write or copy & paste text, the New Message System allows you to easily create a Message and re-use it anywhere you want.

5.title: Rules Window
5.subtitle: The Rules Window has been revamped to provide a better user experience. You can now collapse and uncollapse Quests, and manage them easily. You can also quickly define the information that you want to display within the Victory and Defeat screens.

0.title: The new Quest System allows you to fully customize the Quests

1.title: New options have been added to allow more customization and quests that have been done before should be easier to do now.

7.title: Indicator Component
7.subtitle: The Indicator Component has received a major update, related to the new Quest System and some other improvements

0.title: LifeBar color parameter has been removed to provide a more consistent User Experience within all Metaverse Experiences.

1.title: Objective Cursor parameter has been removed to provide a more consistent User Experience within all Metaverse Experiences.

2.title: The Quest Cursors are now split in 3 parameters: Giver, Objective, Receiver

8.title: Presets
8.subtitle: Creating a Preset has never been so easy. Select the Object you want to transform as a Preset, and click on the related button in the Toolbar to do so.  You can also easily replace an existing Preset by clicking on it when creating a new one. Plus, it is now possible to use Presets inside the Asset Spawner, which gives you more possibilities.

9.title: Tags
9.subtitle: The Tags related to Behaviors and Components have been changed. It might not change your current Experience functionalities as they will remain the same for already-created Experiences, but we suggest taking a look at them.

10.title: Publish
10.subtitle: You can now easily publish your Experience to the Gallery and allow other users to play to the content you created.

11.title: Behaviors and Components
11.subtitle: Behaviors and Components had their tooltips and parameters updated. They should now be easier to understand.

0.title: The balancing has been reworked to provide a better difficulty. Each object has now its difficulty mainly driven by its Catalyst and also its Gems.

1.title: Each Object has a Grade displayed next to its Lifebar. This Grade represents the Catalyst of the Object and the amount of Gems inside it. Thanks to this, Players can now identify the power of an Object easily.

0.title: The Enemy fighter behavior has been automatically replaced by the Melee Enemy behavior.

1.title: This behavior follows the same intentions as the previous one but has been improved to make the fights much more enjoyable.

2.title: A targeting system has been added to make your attacks move your avatar towards the enemies, emoving a previous frustrating experience with this.

14.title: Quest Icons
14.subtitle: As said before, a Quest is split into 4 steps. For 3 of them, a specific Quest Icon is displayed during the Play Mode.

15.title: Inventory & Equipment
15.subtitle: Players will be able to pick up equipment and quest items from experiences and save them in their local inventories. Equip different sets of items to change your character's attributes and become stronger.

16.title: Known Issues
16.subtitle: These are the following known issues for this version of the Game Maker

0.title: Some equipment types may cause experiences to seldomly crash while resetting them.

1.title: On some machines, 4x4 experiences may make the character not move properly.

2.title: If an experience uses unpublished assets, a “selection error” may occur inside the Gallery.

3.title: Experiences that use Loot or Asset Spawner components may cause a crash during gameplay.

4.title: Lighting presets may cause brightness issues on light blocks and assets.

5.title: Library load times may be longer than expected depending on the amount of assets the user has.

6.title: Some avatar body parts may look brighter in some environments.

7.title: Some inputs may be lost while hopping through experiences without opening the inventory beforehand.

0.title: Chat Bubbles (Multiplayer)
0.subtitle: We’ve added Chat Bubbles on top of the Avatar head. Whenever you or someone else types out something in the chat you’ll see a chat bubble on top of their heads if you are close enough to them. This is our first iteration of the feature, we’re planning on revamping the UI for the next release

1.title: NFT Inspect
1.subtitle: From the Inventory, you will be able to access a new Tab called NFT, here you can see a full list of NFT’s and ASSETS used inside an experience and identify what are the trending assets all creators are using.

2.title: Fighting System UI & VFX
2.subtitle: We’re constantly improving on our Avatar, Enemy and Combat Systems. This time we’ve added Visual queues to attacks that show damage numbers when hitting an enemy as well as blocking. We’ve also added and improved upon existing VFX to make combat queues much more clear.

3.title: UI Improvements
3.subtitle: We’ve made some UI/UX improvements across the board. We’ve added pop-ups, improved windows current flows and fixed issues with some screens that were not working optimally.

0.title: Global Game Maker Improvements
0.subtitle: Our main focus with this version was all about performance. We’ve still got ways to go before we can provide the absolute best experience possible but we’ve made quite a few changes in our architecture and you will be able to notice:

list.0: Faster loading and response times of the Game Maker Tools
list.1: Improved performance on different types of PC’s
list.2: Improved performance on bigger experiences with a large amount of assets

1.title: Library Improvements
1.subtitle: We’ve reworked the Library internal structure from scratch, in order to make it faster and smoother when loading and utilizing it. You will notice a big improvement from the previous version.

2.title: Lighting Presets
2.subtitle: We’ve added a new Neutral Lighting preset, in case you don’t want to use any of our current lighting options. We’ve also improved on the already existing presets, eliminating refraction errors on light surfaces as well as correcting color emanation.

3.title: Behaviors
3.subtitle: We’ve fixed some of the behaviors to make better use of our technical stack. Most of our known issues regarding the behavior system have been successfully addressed.

4.title: New Templates
4.subtitle: We’ve added three new experience templates for you to use and learn more about the Game Maker:

list.0: Logic - Behaviours: An experience that lets you test out the different behaviors we have and different ways to use them
list.1: Logic - Victory and Defeat: understand the basics of Victory and Defeat conditions in your game
list.2: Logic - Counter Quest: learn how to make a Death Counter and Collection Counter quest

5.subtitle: We’ve also added another 8 new experience templates without any logic for you to use as starting points:

0.title: Mini Map (Compass)
0.subtitle: We’ve added a new HUD element into our Play Mode in the form of a Mini Map, now you’ll be able to orientate yourself and be provided with specific experience data. This is a simplified version of our Mini Map, stay tuned to see the finalized version soon.

1.title: Gameplay Improvements
1.subtitle: As part of our constant improvements to the Gameplay and Combat system we’ve added the following features:

0.title: Heavy Attack Damage Zone:
0.subtitle: The heavy attack will now have a reticle that shows the area of effect of your attack, as you charge it more, it will deal more damage and the area will be bigger.

1.title: Stun System:
1.subtitle: Heavy Attacks charged up to its limit will now stun all enemies in range when released.

2.title: Parry System:
2.subtitle: You will be able to parry enemy attacks to reduce the damage you’ve taken. If your timing is right you’ll be able to Perfect Parry them, stunning the enemy in consequence.

0.title: NFT Images
0.subtitle: We’ve added the NFT Image component to the Game Maker. Now you’ll be able to add NFT images from Opensea:

list.0: Put them on Billboards and Picture frames to create an NFT environment or art Gallery
list.1: Showcase your owned NFT inside the Sandbox to the players and creators
list.2: Use the NFT Inventory feature to be able to see the NFT in Opensea

1.title: Play Mode Settings
1.subtitle: We’ve added settings to this version of the Game Maker in order to provide a better quality of life for users. In this iteration of the feature you’ll be able to:

list.3: View the play mode Control Scheme (We now support AZERTY too)

2.title: Version Check
2.subtitle: Now, everytime a new version of the Game Maker is available, our servers will check against your current installed version and request you to update to the newest version.

0.title: Fixed assets not fully loading even though they are seen in the experience, if the user switches to play before, they will be lost and several unwanted behaviours occurs. There is now a very small waiting timer before being able to switch to play.

1.title: Fixed several issues related to the Asset Rarity Counts

2.title: Validated not allowing to enter playmode, save, publish, share and go to home if experience not fully loaded.

3.title: Fixed nullref when trying to share or publish an experience with unpublished assets in it.

4.title: Fixed nullrefs when entering NTFs inventory with asset spawner set to "none" (default)

5.title: Fixed error not allowing to share/publish experience with drop component set to "none" (default)

0.title: Known Issues
0.subtitle: The following are the known issues for this version:

0.title: We’ve temporarily disabled the PRESET SYSTEM from the Game Maker due to various issues and crashes happening around its use. All experiences that currently use this feature will still be functional, but the presets won’t be modifiable any further. We’ll be working to get it back up as soon as possible.
Initial Equipment :
0.subtitle: A set of options was added on the Global Parameters Menu that lets users select the starting weapon and equipment the Avatar will commence an experience with.

1.title: Pre-Packaged Assets :
1.subtitle: From now on, we’ll be pre-loading assets into the Game Maker upon installation. This will help substantially with experience loading speeds, both on the Editor and the Gallery.

2.title: Version Check :
2.subtitle: Now, everytime a new version of the Game Maker is available, our servers will check against your current installed version and request you to update to the newest version.

0.title: Transportation Changes :
0.subtitle: We’re preparing various of our systems for some upcoming new releases. In order to enable new and exciting features regarding how players can move from an experience to another, we’ve made some architecture level changes into our current transportation and waygate system.

1.title: Server Templates :
1.subtitle: Previously, our Game Maker Templates were handled locally, now they’ll be held inside our servers so that we can update them in real time with new and exciting content as well as adding new templates without having to release a new Game Maker version.

0.title: Gameplay Improvements :
0.subtitle: As part of our constant improvements to the Gameplay and Combat system we’ve added the following features:

0.title: Fixed various issues that caused random application crashes.

1.title: Fixed various issues that caused the application to become unresponsive

3.title: Fixed various issues regarding Editor Usability

0.title: NFT Image Self Illumination :
0.subtitle: An option was added on the NFT Image Component that lets users select if the environment Illumination affects the NFT image or if it is Self Illuminated.

1.title: NFT Interact Component :
1.subtitle: Gives the creator the opportunity to let the players inspect the NFTs that have this behaviour added.

2.title: Gameplay Improvements :
2.subtitle: As part of our constant improvements to the Gameplay and Combat system we’ve added the following features:

3.title: Fixed various issues regarding Editor Usability

Fixed various issues that caused random application crashes.

0.title: Fixed an issue which caused some assets didn’t have the ID on the saved file.
MacOS build was released with feature parity with Windows version. Both builds are in the same state and should not present any differences.
Performance Improvements:
0.subtitle: Several fixes were made that improved the general performance of the Game Maker.

1.title: UI Improvements:
1.subtitle: Visual issues were spotted and fixed on the UI: Scroll bars on the main menu were fixed and Toggles fixed.

2.title: Lighting Enhancements:
2.subtitle: General lighting enhancements were achieved in playmode, as well as more saturated colours reducing the fog.

0.title: MacOS build was released with feature parity with Windows version. Both builds are in the same state and should not present any differences.
Multiple bug fixes have been made to stabilize the product and get some improvements in performance.
Loading Screen:
0.subtitle: Loading screen is showing more and better information. The loading screen background image has been changed to a default one, and the thumbnail corresponding to the experience is bigger.

1.title: Improvement on the Level Widge:

2.title: Quest Log Widget:

Loading time and asset bundle download has been improved for better user experience.
Avatar gating MVP feature was implemented into the GC. The user will receive a message with the appropriate collection/avatar in case it doesn’t owe one.
Avatar Navigation:

1.title: Walk:
1.subtitle: The user is now able to walk, by using the walk key. This will let the user appreciate the NFT better if needed.

2.title: Sit on the Ground:

3.title: Auto Climb Update Improvements:

rarity.description: The behavior defines how ehe asset is going to behave in Game Maker.
rarity.artOrProp: If you choose Art or Prop Tier, you can't add some gems to your asset
rarity.stepCommonInfo: This is the first tier for NFT. They have limited use in the Game Maker and generate little Ethos Points.
rarity.stepRareInfo: Rare NFT have increased Game Maker usage and rewards more Ethos Point.
rarity.stepEpicInfo: Epic NFT have access to almost all Game Maker functionalities and can reward Catalyst and Gems.
rarity.stepLegendaryInfo: This is the first tier for NFT. They have limited use in the Game Maker and generate little Ethos Point.
rarity.stepPropInfo: Art NFT have no special capcities in the Game Maker but allow you to maje unique pieces to showcase your talent.
rarity.stepArtInfo: Art NFT have no special capcities in the Game Maker but allow you to maje unique pieces to showcase your talent.
rarity.nftPremiumOrBasic: Your NFT can be Basic or Premium.
rarity.nftPremium: - Premium NFTs have a Catalyst that defines their scarcity and their number of gem sockets.
rarity.nftBasic: - Basic NFTs can be Props or Art. They have no special utilities.
rarity.rarityTitleNoWhitelist: For now, you can only create Basic NFTs. Basics NFTs can be Props or Art and have no special utilities.

create.title: Create your own voxels in VoxEdit
create.body: Assets have an important role in the ecosystem, you need them to build an experience or to improve your game. Stake them to earn rewards or build your own assets to sell them on the Marketplace.

set.title: Set attributes: Catalyst & Gems
set.body: Gems & Catalysts are The Sandbox’s utility token burnt on usage that defines your ASSET’s attributes. Attributes define your ASSET’s main stats that will be displayed on the Sandbox’s game experiences throughout our metaverse, meaning that the more attributes your ASSETS have the more useful you’ll find them within the Sandbox, and thus incrementing its value.

myAssets.title: What can I do with my assets
myAssets.body: To make a game on your LAND or ESTATE, you will need to download the free Game Maker software. You will also be able to buy a game on the Marketplace. Design and test your game using the Game Maker, publishing experiences will be available soon.

strapi.POC_LANDING_MINT_AVATAR_DESCRIPTION: In addition to be fully playable avatars in The Sandbox, POC Avatars will give holders the ability to display their sexual orientation and pronouns. You decide who you want to be!
strapi.POC_LANDING_INTRO_DESCRIPTION: We are building the metaversal blueprint for diversity across Web3. Our first step is a unique selection of The Sandbox metaverse avatars, all around inclusion and diversity.
strapi.POC_LANDING_INTRO_MOVIE_DESCRIPTION: United in advancing and celebrating representation, diversity and culture
strapi.POC_LANDING_OUR_VISION_DESCRIPTION_PRIMA: To ensure the advancement of black and brown women, LGBTQIA+, differently-abled, and POC individuals across Web 3.0.
strapi.POC_LANDING_OUR_VISION_DESCRIPTION_SECON: We envision a community where we are represented and amplified at every level from developers, creators, brands, thought leaders, founders, and collectors.
strapi.POC_LANDING_PLAY_IN_SEASON_DESCRIPTION: Each Avatar will be playable inside The Sandbox, starting with the upcoming Alpha Season 3. Get your Avatar, jump into the game and share your avatar with the world!In addition we will also host POC exclusive events and Play & Earn activities for avatar holders.
strapi.POC_LANDING_CHANCE_UNIQUE_AVATAR_DESCRIP: First ever customizable sandbox avatars celebrating representation, diversity and inclusion. POC has been on a mission to have a positive impact around the world
strapi.POC_LANDING_CHANCE_UNIQUE_AVATAR_TYPES_U: This is no marketing gimmick. Each avatar trait has been designed by a diverse team with inclusion in mind, resulting in 100+ unique avatar traits.
strapi.POC_LANDING_CHANCE_UNIQUE_AVATAR_TYPES_C: Choose your identity in the metaverse and display your orientation and affinity through your digital avatar. A first of its kind, possible in The Sandbox!
strapi.POC_LANDING_CHANCE_UNIQUE_AVATAR_TYPES_S: Included in the collection is a limited amount of hand-crafted 1:1 avatars. Who will be the lucky person?
strapi.POC_LANDING_BRANDS_IN_THE_SANDBOX_TITLE: Brands & IPs already in The Sandbox Metaverse
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_HOW_MANY_POC_TITLE: How many People of Crypto(POC) Avatars are there?
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_HOW_MANY_POC_DESCRIPTION: There are a total of 8,430 programmatically generated People of Crypto Avatars that will be minted.
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_WHAT_IS_THEIR_RARITY_DES: The POC Avatars are divided into a variety of rarity categories depending on traits. There are thousands of unique avatars, as well as several hand-crafted 1/1 avatars.
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_WHERE_DO_I_HAVE_TO_GO_TI: Where do I have to go to claim the Avatars?
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_WHERE_DO_I_HAVE_TO_GO_DE:
There is only one place where you can mint the Avatars: 
 {link}
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_AT_WHAT_TIME_TITLE: At what time does the sale start?
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_AT_WHAT_TIME_DESCRIPTION:
The sale will start on June {launchDatePublic}. 
 Welcomelisted users will have access 24 hours before.
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_HOW_MUCH_SHOULD_I_TITLE: How much should I expect to pay for one People of Crypto NFT?
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_HOW_MUCH_SHOULD_I_DESCRI: One POC NFT will cost {sandAmount} SAND.
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_HOW_MANY_CAN_I_MINT_TITL: How many POC Avatars can I mint per wallet address?
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_HOW_MANY_CAN_I_MINT_DESC:
The POC Avatars will be released in two waves: 
 1) Welcomelisted users will have a chance to mint a maximum of two avatar with a time limit of 24 hours, between June 20th and June 21th. 
 2) When the public release is live, users will have the chance to mint up to three.
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_WHEN_CAN_I_DISCOVER_TITL: When can I discover what POC Avatar I minted?
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_WHEN_CAN_I_DISCOVER_DESC: The POC Avatars will be revealed 24 hours after public sale start on OpenSea.
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_CAN_I_MINT_USING_TITLE: Can I mint using any wallet?
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_CAN_I_MINT_USING_DESCRIP: Yes, you can mint with whatever wallet you have.
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_WHAT_CAN_I_DO_TITLE: What can I do with the POC Avatars?
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_WHAT_WHAT_CAN_I_DO_DESCR: Each Avatar will be playable inside The Sandbox in all the multiplayer experiences to come starting from the Sandbox Alpha Season 3.
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_HOW_CAN_I_USE_TITLE: How can I use my People of Crypto Avatar during the Alpha?
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_HOW_CAN_I_USE_DESCRIPTIO: You will be able to use it as an Avatar by simply selecting it in the Avatar Manager in The Sandbox dashboard.
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_DOES_OWNING_TITLE: Does owning the POC Avatar grant me other perks?
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_DOES_OWNING_DESCRIPTION: Owning your own avatar will grant you access and features within the Diversity and Inclusion Center, as well as other Play & Earn perks.
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_WHERE_CAN_I_BUY_TITLE: Where can I buy an avatar after the initial sale is over?
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_WHERE_CAN_I_BUY_DESCRIPT: After the initial sale is over, you will be able to purchase an avatar from users that are willing to sell theirs on the secondary marketplace Opensea
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_HOW_DO_I_GET_WHITELISTED:
If you hold one of the NFT listed below, 24 hours before the minting starts, you will have early access to mint your POC avatar: 
 - Snoop Dogg Doggies avatar holders 
 - Rumble Kong League 
 Land owners will also be welcome listed. If you are not a holder of any of these, please go to peopleofcrypto.io. 
 Winning one of our Twitter contests can also give you early access to mint your NFT.
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_HOW_DO_I_KNOW_IF_TITLE: How do I know if I'm welcomelisted
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_HOW_DO_I_KNOW_IF_DESCRIP: If you hold an NFT of the above collection, you will be able to mint, as long as you hold the NFT in the wallet with which you are welcome listed, and connected on the minting page.
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_HOW_MANY_MINT_AS_WHITELI: How many POC Avatars can I mint as a welcomelisted user?
You will be able to mint two NFTs as a welcome listed user.
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_MY_AVATARS_TITLE: My Avatar(s) is not revealed yet on OpenSea. What can I do?
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_MY_AVATARS_DESCRIPTION: If you are checking after the reveal date (24 hours after public sale start), feel free to press the Refresh Metadata button on the top-right corner of OpenSea.
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_BUYING_NFT_TITLE: Buying NFT for the first time, how can I get started?
strapi.POC_LANDING_FAQ_BUYING_NFT_DESCRIPTION:
The process is quite simple. You need to ensure that you have:  
 - Created an account on The Sandbox. 
 - Ensure you have both the correct amount of SAND to mint the number of avatars you want and some ETH to cover the gas fees. 
 - Log into your account and head over to the mint page: {link} 
 -Check that your wallet is properly connected and just press the Mint button to retrieve your avatar.
strapi.POC_RAFFLE_HOW_TO_MINT_TITLE: How to mint a poc avatar
strapi.POC_RAFFLE_PLAY_CREATE_GOVERN_SUBTITLE: a virtual world made by players
strapi.POC_RAFFLE_PLAY_CREATE_GOVERN_DESCRIPTIO: Play experiences both singleplayer and multiplayer. Create and animate assets with Voxedit 3D. Build unique game experiences in The Sandbox Metaverse with the Game Maker tool. Buy and Sell assets in the Marketplace to enhance your experience.
In The Sandbox, the only limit is your imagination.
strapi.POC_RAFFLE_JOIN_OUR_COMMUNITY_SUBTITLE: Be part of our amazing community and stay tuned for any news.
strapi.POC_RAFFLE_PERSONALIZE_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: The application has encountered an unknown error.
strapi.POC_LANDING_META_TITLE: The Sandbox Game – People of Crypto Avatars coming to the metaverse
strapi.POC_LANDING_META_DESCRIPTION: The People of Crypto avatars are entering The Sandbox. Have fun exploring the metaverse and bring this world to life with your friends. Get your avatar now and enter The Sandbox.
strapi.POC_LANDING_META_KEYWORDS: sandbox, voxel art, 3D voxel game, voxel artists, 3D online PC game, community, blockchain dapp, PC voxel game, PC voxel art, decentralized game, SAND, token, snoop dogg, raffle
strapi.POC_LANDING_META_OG_TITLE: The Sandbox Game – People of Crypto Avatars coming to the metaverse
strapi.POC_LANDING_META_OG_DESCRIPTION: The People of Crypto avatars are entering The Sandbox. Have fun exploring the metaverse and bring this world to life with your friends. Get your avatar now and enter The Sandbox.
strapi.POC_LANDING_META_OG_SITE_URL: The Sandbox Game – People of Crypto Avatars coming to the metaverse
strapi.POC_LANDING_META_TWITTER_TITLE: The Sandbox Game – People of Crypto Avatars coming to the metaverse
strapi.POC_LANDING_META_TWITTER_DESCRIPTION: The People of Crypto avatars are entering The Sandbox. Have fun exploring the metaverse and bring this world to life with your friends. Get your avatar now and enter The Sandbox.
strapi.POC_LANDING_META_TWITTER_CARD: People of Crypto are coming to The Sandbox
strapi.POC_RAFFLE_FAQ_CAN_I_CUSTOMIZE_DESCRIPTI: Besides using your unique POC avatar inside The Sandbox, you can also choose your identity and orientation through our website. This gives you the possibility to truly express yourself inside the metaverse and be unique.
strapi.POC_RAFFLE_FAQ_WHAT_IMPACT_TITLE: What impact does customization have on the game?
strapi.POC_RAFFLE_FAQ_WHAT_IMPACT_DESCRIPTION: Depending on your selection, your avatar will receive colored wrist bands, which visually display your orientation and identity to other users in the metaverse and inside The Sandbox.
strapi.POC_RAFFLE_FAQ_HOW_MANY_TIMES_CAN_AN_AVA: How does choosing the identity and orientation of an avatar work?
Each avatar can be customized, the process is free and only gas costs will need to be covered by the user.
strapi.POC_RAFFLE_FAQ_DO_THEY_NEED_TO_PAY_TITLE: Do they need to pay every time they want to customize an avatar?
strapi.POC_RAFFLE_FAQ_DO_THEY_NEED_TO_PAY_DESCR: Yes, the transaction itself is free, but gas needs to be covered by the user.
strapi.POC_RAFFLE_FAQ_CAN_I_CUSTOMIZE_MULTIPLE_: Can I customize multiple avatars at the same time?
No, the interaction needs to be done for each avatar you own individually
strapi.POC_RAFFLE_META_DESCRIPTION: Come and participate in the raffle! Anyone can win, all you have to do is try your luck!
strapi.POC_RAFFLE_META_KEYWORDS: sandbox, voxel art, 3D voxel game, voxel artists, 3D online PC game, community, blockchain dapp, PC voxel game, PC voxel art, decentralized game, SAND, token, raffle

strapi.STEVE_AOKI_LANDING_INTRO_DESCRIPTION: Coming at you harder than a cake-throw, Steve Aoki is entering The Sandbox and gives anyone the opportunity to be Steve Aoki in the metaverse. Unique designs, hand-crafted and curated with one of the world’s coolest musicians.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_LANDING_OUR_VISION_DESCRIPTIO: The Steve Aoki Avatars are a collection of 3,333 unique and randomly generated metaverse avatars for The Sandbox. Each avatar will be a playable avatar inside The Sandbox unlocking unique functionalities and giving owners the possibility to earn SAND through playing.
Become Steve Aoki and enter The Sandbox today!
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_LANDING_MINT_AVATAR_DESCRIPTI: Get your unique Steve Aoki avatar for The Sandbox today and enter the metaverse.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_LANDING_PLAY_IN_SEASON_DESCRI: Each Avatar will be playable inside The Sandbox, starting with the upcoming Alpha Season 3. Get your Avatar, jump into the game and share your avatar with the world! In addition we will also host Steve Aoki exclusive events and Play & Earn activities for avatar holders.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_LANDING_CHANCE_UNIQUE_AVATAR_: Each Aoki avatar has been created by randomly generating 3,333 playable metaverse avatars. Over 100 hand-crafted traits, as well as several unique 1/1 designs can be created!
No two avatars will look alike. Discover a collection of 3,333 entirely unique looking avatars.
Discover multiple unique designs and exclusive 1/1 Aoki’s, which are super rare.
Use your avatar to unlock new functionality within The Sandbox, including access to experiences and possibilities to earn SAND.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_LANDING_BRANDS_IN_THE_SANDBOX: Brands & IPs already in The Sandbox Metaverse
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_LANDING_QR_SUBTITLE: Show us your best moves! Share with the community
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_LANDING_SANDBOX_METAVERSE_DES: A decentralized Universe on the blockchain owned by the community
A place where your NFTs become alive
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_LANDING_META_TITLE: The Sandbox Game – Steve Aoki Avatars coming to the metaverse
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_LANDING_META_DESCRIPTION: Be Steve Aoki in the metaverse! Each avatar is a unique, hand-crafted, playable NFT avatar in The Sandbox with unique utilities giving owners the possibility to earn SAND through playing.

strapi.COMMON_BRANDS_IN_THE_SANDBOX_TITLE: Brands & IPs already in The Sandbox Metaverse
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_HOW_MANY_STEVE_AOKI_TITLE: How many Steve Aoki Avatars are there?
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_HOW_MANY_STEVE_AOKI_DESCR: There are a total of 3,333 Aoki Avatars that will be minted.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_WHAT_IS_THEIR_RARITY_DESC: The avatars are divided into a variety of rarity categories depending on traits. Each avatar will be unique, and generated through a random weight of traits which affect the visual look & feel. In addition there will be multiple unique 1/1 NFTs.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_WHERE_DO_I_HAVE_TO_GO_TIT: Where do I have to go to claim the Avatars?
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_WHERE_DO_I_HAVE_TO_GO_DES:
There is only one place where you can mint the Avatars: 
 {link}
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_AT_WHAT_TIME_TITLE: At what time does the sale start?
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_AT_WHAT_TIME_DESCRIPTION:
The sale will start on {launchDatePublic}. 
Whitelisted users will have access 48 hours before.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_HOW_MUCH_SHOULD_I_TITLE: How much should I expect to pay for one Steve Aoki Avatar NFT?
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_HOW_MUCH_SHOULD_I_DESCRIP: One Avatar NFT will cost {sandAmount} SAND.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_HOW_MANY_CAN_I_MINT_TITLE: How many Avatars can I mint per wallet address?
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_HOW_MANY_CAN_I_MINT_DESCR:
The Aoki Avatars will be released in 3 waves: 
 1) July 25th 2022, 2PM UTC: People whitelisted by Aoki himself will have a chance to mint up to 2 avatars per wallet, within a 48 hours timeframe. 
 2) July 26th 2022, 2PM UTC: People whitelisted by Aoki AND The Sandbox will have a chance to mint up to 2 avatars per wallet, within a 24 hours timeframe. 
 3) July 27th 2022, 2PM UTC: Public release. Every user will have the chance to mint up to 4 avatars per wallet. 
 *please note that the first whitelist wave will be limited to a maximum of 2,000 Aoki Avatars. This is to ensure a fair distribution for all other users.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_WHEN_CAN_I_DISCOVER_TITLE: How can I see my avatar?
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_WHEN_CAN_I_DISCOVER_DESCR: The Steve Aoki Avatars will be revealed 48 hours after minting on OpenSea.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_CAN_I_MINT_USING_TITLE: Can I mint using any wallet?
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_CAN_I_MINT_USING_DESCRIPT: Yes, you can mint with whatever wallet you have.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_WHAT_CAN_I_DO_TITLE: What can I do with the Avatars?
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_WHAT_WHAT_CAN_I_DO_DESCRI: Each Avatar will be playable inside The Sandbox in all the multiplayer experiences to come starting from the Sandbox Alpha Season 3. We will also introduce unique Play&Earn opportunites for avatar holders, giving any holder the opportunity to earn SAND through gameplay.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_HOW_CAN_I_USE_TITLE: How can I use my Avatar inside The Sandbox?
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_HOW_CAN_I_USE_DESCRIPTION: You will be able to use it as an Avatar by simply selecting it in the Avatar Manager in The Sandbox dashboard once it has been enabled.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_WHERE_CAN_I_BUY_TITLE: Where can I buy a Steve Aoki avatar after the initial sale is over?
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_WHERE_CAN_I_BUY_DESCRIPTI: After the initial sale is over, you will be able to purchase as many avatars as you like from users that are willing to sell theirs on the secondary marketplace Opensea
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_HOW_DO_I_GET_WHITELISTED_:
If you hold one of the below NFTs, at the time of snapshot, you can mint a maximum of 2 Aoki Avatar 48h before official minting start: 
 - A0K1VERSE Passport (Snapshot: Monday 18th July at 2pm UTC) 
If you hold one of the below NFTs, at the time of snapshot, you can mint a maximum of 2 Aoki Avatars 24h before official minting start: 
 - The Sandbox LAND (Snapshot: Thursday July 21st at 2pm UTC) 
 - The Doggies Avatar (Snapshot: Thursday July 21st at 2pm UTC) 
 - People of Crypto Avatar (Snapshot: Thursday July 21st at 2pm UTC) 
 - Winning one of our Twitter contests can also give you early access to mint your NFT
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_HOW_DO_I_KNOW_IF_TITLE: How do I know if I’m whitelisted?
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_HOW_DO_I_KNOW_IF_DESCRIPT: If you hold an NFT of the above collection, you will be able to mint, as long as you hold the NFT in the wallet with which you are whitelisted, and connected on the minting page.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_MY_AVATARS_TITLE: My Avatars are not revealed yet on OpenSea. What can I do?
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_MY_AVATARS_DESCRIPTION: If you are checking before they have been revealed, this is normal. If you are checking after that date, press the “Refresh Metadata” button on the top-right corner of OpenSea.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_BUYING_NFT_TITLE: Buying NFT for the first time, how can I get started?
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_FAQ_BUYING_NFT_DESCRIPTION:
The process is quite simple. You need to ensure that you have:  
 - Created an account on The Sandbox. 
 - Ensure you have both the correct amount of SAND to mint the number of avatars you want and some ETH to cover the gas fees. 
 - Log into your account and head over to the mint page: {link} 
 - Check that your wallet is properly connected and just press the Mint button to retrieve your Avatar.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_LANDING_MINT_AVATAR_DESCRIPTI: The Aokis are SOLD OUT! Head over to OpenSea and explore all available avatars for sale.
strapi.STEVE_AOKI_RAFFLE_HOW_TO_MINT_MINT_NOW_S: The Sandbox whitelist - Land owners, Doggies and People of Crypto avatars holders

build.title: Let’s build the open Metaverse together
build.desc1: Everyone is welcome inside The Sandbox : brands, studios, independent creators, you are all part of our ecosystem.
build.desc2: As we are all different, you all have different needs and we are here to help you get into our world

partnership.title: The Sandbox is a place for any kind of partnerships

1.title: IPs and Brands
1.desc: You have a brand and you are wondering how you can enter The Sandbox? You are at the right place, we will help you develop your brand image into our ecosystem.
1.question: You have a brand and you are wondering how you can enter The Sandbox?
1.answer: We will help you develop your brand image into our ecosystem.

2.title: Metaverse Agencies
2.desc: You are advising clients to design their web3 strategy and you consider partnering with The Sandbox. We have room for you as well.

3.title: Independent Studios
3.desc: You are a gaming studio and you want to develop your own concept inside our voxel world, contact us so we can help you develop your genuine experience.

1.subtitle: Access to our platform
1.desc1: Partnering with The Sandbox is not only a way to join one of the biggest metaverse in the world, it is also a true standpoint for accessibility.
1.desc2: Everyone, from a powerful gaming computer to a mobile device, will be able to access our platform.
1.desc3: Our quest toward interoperability also will help our community and the overall market merge worlds all together.

2.subtitle: brands already involved
2.desc1: Our unique identity and our plan to market have already helped more than 200 brands to get into our space and develop their own world. When you join The Sandbox, you also join Gucci, Adidas, Snoop Dogg, Ubisoft and much more...
2.desc2: Be part of the amazing ecosystem where brands create out of this world experiences for the pleasure and growth of their community.
2.desc3: Our quest toward interoperability also will help our community and the overall market mege worlds all together.

3.title: +2.5 MILLION
3.subtitle: and growing wallets registered
3.desc1: We have already gathered a strongly involved community, ready to jump on any interesting experiences.
3.desc2: Our idea has always been to make sure the final end user is able to live the most out of each projects.

howpartner.title: PARTNERS WHO BUILT THEIR OWN WORLD

1.title: Care Bears
1.desc: Care Bears and The Sandbox partnered up to bring a selection of unique and colorful NFTs to the world...

2.title: Snoop Dogg
2.desc: Snoop Dogg and The Sandbox partnered up to bring a selection of unique and colorful NFTs to the world...

3.title: The Walking Dead
3.desc: The Walking Dead and The Sandbox partnered up to bring a selection of unique and colorful NFTs to the world...

4.title: Deadmau5
4.desc: Deadmau5 and The Sandbox partnered up to bring a selection of unique and colorful NFTs to the world...

5.title: The Smurfs
5.desc: The Smurfs and The Sandbox partnered up to bring a selection of unique and colorful NFTs to the world...

createdunique.title: And created unique experiences!
createdunique.desc: Entering The Sandbox means you craft your own universe where communities will navigate and discover your brand and enjoy a truly unique experience in a voxel world.

1.title: Fashion
1.desc: Virtual cat-walking is now a thing. Come join us to experience a new way to consider fashion, to own virtual assets from worldwide digital brands and access a brand new ecosystem.

2.title: Gaming
2.desc: The Sandbox metaverse draws its roots from a deep gaming culture, where the fun is a whole part of the show. Enter our universe to build your own and dive into a voxel world where anything is possible.

3.title: Lifestyle
3.desc: Chilling by the pool with some friends sounds cool? The metaverse can help you deliver a social experience as you would in real life, without limiting yourself with physical hurdles. The metaverse is a place where you can do whatever you want, embody an avatar, visit, shop and play.

4.title: Sports
4.desc: Playing soccer, supporting your favorite club, watching tennis matches etc… this is all possible in the voxel world. The Sandbox translates the physical experience in a new way to embody our favorite disciplines

5.title: Music
5.desc: From LA to The Sandbox, there is only one step, and Snoop Dogg understood this. The Sandbox is about delivering a new viewer experience during concerts and live performance. Enabling broader access to everyone, interacting with the crowd, through their avatars. Fans are now complete part of the deal.

createdunique.desc2: From building houses and cities, to cat walking during fashion shows and defeating dragons and monsters, you are free to offer the experience you dream of.

unverified.label: Not Verified
unverified.description: As much as we love robots, we want the Metaverse to be full of humans. Your account needs to be verified to join some activities such as the LAND Sale Raffle or claiming Season rewards. This is one of the many measures we are taking to prevent bots, cheaters and bad actors exploiting our ecosystem.

termsOfUse.text85: “name” MUST NOT be obscene or have racist connotations
termsOfUse.text88: “description” MUST NOT be obscene or have racist connotations
termsOfUse.text89: “image” MUST BE a valid IPFS URL linking to an image of format png / gif / jpeg / webp
termsOfUse.text90: The image must exist on the IPFS network at the time (or in the next hour) of the minting event
termsOfUse.text91: The file linked must be a true representation of the voxel Asset and should not mislead the viewer.
termsOfUse.text92: “creator” MUST be equal to the creator defined via the Asset smart contract
termsOfUse.text94: The graphical representation must fit the type. A house for example MUST NOT be registered as an “avatar_body_part” type
termsOfUse.text95: “biome_restriction” CAN be set to one biome type where the asset is only allowed to be present (does not apply to asset_type==”avatar_body_part”)
termsOfUse.text96: “category” MUST be set to one of
termsOfUse.text117: “tags” CAN be set to an array of string value categorizing the Asset in various ways
termsOfUse.text118: Any of the string value present in “tags” MUST NOT be obscene or have racist connotations
termsOfUse.text120: “vxc.url” MUST be a valid IPFS URL linking to a voxel asset of format VXC
termsOfUse.text121: The vxc file must exist on the IPFS network at the time (or in the next hour) of the minting event
termsOfUse.text122: The voxel asset MUST NOT be obscene or have racist connotations
termsOfUse.text123: “vxc.height” MUST equal to the voxel height of the asset linked at vxc.url
termsOfUse.text124: “vxc.width” MUST equal to the voxel width of the asset linked at vxc.url
termsOfUse.text125: “vxc.depth” MUST equal to the voxel depth of the asset linked at vxc.url
termsOfUse.text126: “vxc.num_voxels” MUST equal to the number of voxel used in the asset linked at vxc.url
termsOfUse.text127: “vxc.size” MUST equal to the size in bytes of the asset linked at vxc.url
termsOfUse.text128: “vxc.num_animations” MUST equal to the number of animations defined in the asset linked at vxc.url
termsOfUse.text129: “gltf.url” ” MUST be a valid IPFS url linking to a voxel asset of format GLTF
termsOfUse.text130: The gltf file must exist on the IPFS network at the time (or in the next hour) of the minting event
termsOfUse.text131: The gltf 3d representation must be a true representation of the voxel Asset and should not mislead the viewer.
termsOfUse.text132: “gltf.size” MUST equal to the size in bytes of the asset linked at gltf.url
termsOfUse.text133: “sandbox_policy” MUST be equal to the IPFS url generated from that policy content
termsOfUse.text134: “use_policy” MUST be a valid IPFS url linking to a policy file describing the valid uses authorized by the creator for the owner
termsOfUse.text135: “variations_policy” MUST be a valid IPFS url linking to a policy file describing what variations of the asset linked are allowed.
termsOfUse.text136: Such field is optional, if not present, no variations are allowed. If the Asset linked is itself a variations, the “variations_policy of the original Assets takes precedence”
termsOfUse.text137: “original_assets” MUST be a list of ids of existing Assets from which the Asset linked is a variation.
termsOfUse.text138: Variations need to abide by the rules of the variations policy of these original assets.
termsOfUse.text139: They must respect the variations restriction set in the respective “variations_policy”
termsOfUse.text141: “sandbox_creator_profile_url” MUST be equal to “https://sandbox.game/creator/creator address” where creator address is the ethereum address of the creator
termsOfUse.text142: “sandbox_asset_url” MUST be equal to “https://sandbox.game/asset/tokenID” where tokenID is the id of the Asset as generated by the smart contract
termsOfUse.text143: “sketchfab_url” MUST be a link referring to a 3d representation of the voxel asset on sketchfab.
termsOfUse.text144: The 3d representation must be a true representation of the voxel Asset and should not mislead the viewer.
termsOfUse.text146: If you are resident of Japan, you may participate in contests and different activities to obtain rewards; due to restrictions in Japan, these rewards will not include SAND.

0.title: New Features
list: Login (for Content Collab feature)
Animation Channels!
Ability to toggle between per axis and SLERP (spherical linear interpolation, i.e: what we had before) for multi axis rotations
Automated SLERP toggle to keep old behaviour for most animators
Reference frames for translation (World, Parent, Object)
Camera POV widget
Color, node name and channel filters for timeline
Delete Material button in Material panel
Append Palette in Palette header menu
Circle and Sphere tools for Modeler and Block Editor
Value dragging and arrows for Inspector transform text fields
Double clicking a node in the viewport now edits it's attached model
Floor grid toggle for Animator
"Solo Layer" mode for Modeler
Upload Popup

1.title: Improvements
list: New and improved themes!
Tab system for Library and Inspector
Vertical layout for Inspector, with new/delete keyframe per channel buttons
Save and Save As in File menu
Button to remove recent file from list
Picker tool now works on any visible voxel, not just the active layer's ones
Opening a rig now sets the camera to fit
Camera now works better, makes it almost impossible to lock itself inside of geometry
Added shortcuts to Sync To/From MagicaVoxel (ctrl/cmd+m, shift+ctrl/cmd+m)
Added shortcut to Return to Rig from editing a model (esc)
Added shortcut to copy from/paste to currently focused textfield (ctrl/cmd + c/v)
Shorter rows in Timeline
Better Animator floor grid
Updated links to Marketplace, Tutorials, Guidelines, etc
New Language Selector UI
Added Move In Plane widget for selected voxel movement
Selected voxel edges are now shown in new "see through" mode
Orthographic camera is better
In shortest editor window, Modeler toolbar changes it's layout to be in two columns
Voxel and node count for Animator

2.title: Changes
list: Animation max length is now 30 seconds
Removed Long Way Rotation (backwards compatibility kept by autoadding a middle keyframe)
Removed Local Transforms (backwards compatibility by adding a child node that is transformed using the original local transform and attaching the node's model to it instead)
GLTF is now exporting all animations for animated assets, not only the ones that have more keyframes
Removed Keep Position through Rotation unintuitive feature
Node names are now limited to 24 characters
New Animations now take first frame pose from the current pose
VoxEdit now only runs as a single instance
New Keyframe is disabled while playing an animation
Inspector IK values are no longer editable while playing an animation
Timeline rows are now a bit shorter
Removed "Scroll Layer" buttons from Modeler viewport (easier to work with the Translation widget)
Moving Keyframe at frame 0 now copies it

3.title: Fixes
list: Syncing from MagicaVoxel now selects the correct active material
Fixed issues with operative system locale and Inspector transform text fields
Fixed scroll areas not resetting when resized
Attaching/detaching panels now close all modals
Deleting a layer now ensures that there is an active layer afterwards
Loop and Zoom bars are now much better behaved
Detached panels now enforce a min size
Undo and redo no longer break selected voxels in Modeler
Zoom to fit now shows at least 2 seconds
Recovered most functionality while animation is playing
Editor no longer crashes when stress clicking attach/detach panel buttons
Skeleton now trims down too long node names.
Save Confirmation popup trims down too long filenames
Text in Welcome Screen has better readability now
Opening a non existant recent file no longer crashes VE
Default theme no longer has the same color for the grid and the background in the Animator
Using Bucket tool in Paint or Erase mode outside of the volume in 2D views no longer crashes the editor
Frame tool didn't create an Undo step
New Keyframe will no longer add them to read only template nodes
Camera reset was changing the near and far planes
Block Editor kept old undo steps inbetween sessions
Screen Rect tool in Block Editor now renders rectangle on top
2D views now update properly when the user cancels an action
Select mode with Face tool on empty space in 2D view no longer crashes the editor
Screen Rect tool in 2D views was mirrored on X in TOP and BOTTOM views
Next Keyframe button and shortcut now work properly
Copying/Pasting Keyframes no longer crash the editor
Tweaking an IK constrain was making it invisible
Moving Keyframes in a dettached Timeline while the animation is running no longer crashes VE
Moving/copying keyframes now create an undo step
Palette header menus are now correctly rendered for a dettached Palette panel
Adding/deleting layers now move the scroll properly
Deleting a model kept it's thumbnail in the cache
Opening a VXM now sets the first visible layer to be active
Bucket tool with SELECT/PAINT/ERASE mode wasn't working well on the RIGHT/BOTTOM/BACK bounds of the volume
Keyframe rect selection now works even if the left bound is behind the zero frame
Loading a non palette PNG as a palette no longer overwrites the first slot with a white material
Deleting VXMs from Library and importing/creating new ones with the same name will no longer show old thumbnail
Having a different decimal separator than "." set in the OS's regional settings no longer crashes VE
Creating decorative nodes for assets made based on decorable templates no longer crashes VE
Load Palette from a dettached Palette panel no longer crashes VE
Screen Rect tool now works properly in 2D views
Dragging/copying a KF on top of another now overwrites it properly
